./  ADD  SSI=82010217,NAME=IDAM19R3
         TITLE 'IDAM19R3--VSAM PROBLEM STATE I/O DRIVER                *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA019R3 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA019R3  78.201'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @11,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                         0001 00012000
         IDASVR14                                                       00013000
*   PLHAMB=ADDR(IDAAMB);            /* SAVE ADDR FOR IGC121  @Z30SSMR*/ 00014000
         ST    RAMB,PLHAMB(,RPLH)                                  0086 00015000
*   PLHVAMB=ON;                     /* PLHAMB IS VALID       @Z30SSMR*/ 00016000
         OI    PLHVAMB(RPLH),B'00100000'                           0087 00017000
*   IF RPLWAITX=ON&                 /* IF A VALID WAITX      @ZA07549*/ 00018000
*       RPLASY=OFF THEN             /* REQUEST (I.E. SYN)    @ZA07549*/ 00019000
         L     @14,PLHCRPL(,RPLH)                                  0088 00020000
         TM    RPLWAITX(@14),B'00000100'                           0088 00021000
         BNO   @RF00088                                            0088 00022000
         TM    RPLASY(@14),B'00001000'                             0088 00023000
         BNZ   @RF00088                                            0088 00024000
*     DO;                           /* MAKE SURE ECB POSTED  @ZA07549*/ 00025000
*       IF RPLECBSW=ON THEN         /*                       @ZA07549*/ 00026000
         TM    RPLECBSW(@14),B'00000001'                           0090 00027000
         BNO   @RF00090                                            0090 00028000
*         RPLECB->ECBPOST=ON;       /*                       @ZA07549*/ 00029000
         L     @14,RPLECB(,@14)                                    0091 00030000
         OI    ECBPOST(@14),B'01000000'                            0091 00031000
*       ELSE                                                       0092 00032000
*         RPLPOST=ON;               /*                       @ZA07549*/ 00033000
         B     @RC00090                                            0092 00034000
@RF00090 L     @14,PLHCRPL(,RPLH)                                  0092 00035000
         OI    RPLPOST(@14),B'01000000'                            0092 00036000
*       PLHSR=OFF;                  /*                       @ZA07549*/ 00037000
@RC00090 NI    PLHSR(RPLH),B'11111110'                             0093 00038000
*     END;                          /* END WAITX CODE        @ZA07549*/ 00039000
*   IF AMBTRACEÂ¬=ZERO&              /* IS IDATRACE ACTIVE    @ZA29388*/ 00040000
*       BUFCMW=ON THEN              /* AND MUST WRITE ON     @ZA29388*/ 00041000
@RF00088 L     @14,AMBTRACE(,RAMB)                                 0095 00042000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0095 00043000
         BZ    @RF00095                                            0095 00044000
         TM    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'10000000'                           0095 00045000
         BNO   @RF00095                                            0095 00046000
*     DO;                           /*                       @ZA29388*/ 00047000
*       CALL IDA019ST;              /* CALL IDATRACE         @ZA29388*/ 00048000
         L     @15,@CV00662                                        0097 00049000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0097 00050000
*       GEN(DC X'0002');            /* TRACE ID              @ZA29388*/ 00051000
         DC X'0002'                                                     00052000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA29388*/ 00053000
*/********************************************************************/ 00054000
*/*                                                                  */ 00055000
*/*              GO TO SUPERVISOR STATE I/O DRIVER (SIOD)            */ 00056000
*/*                                                                  */ 00057000
*/********************************************************************/ 00058000
*                                                                  0100 00059000
*SCHDSIOD:                                                         0100 00060000
*   RWORK0=RPLH;                    /* POINTER TO PLH IN REG 0       */ 00061000
@RF00095 DS    0H                                                  0100 00062000
SCHDSIOD LR    RWORK0,RPLH                                         0100 00063000
*   R1=RPARM1;                      /* POINTER TO IOMB IN REG 1      */ 00064000
         LR    R1,RPARM1                                           0101 00065000
*   R15=RBUFC;                      /* POINTER TO BUFC IN REG 15     */ 00066000
         LR    R15,RBUFC                                           0102 00067000
*   SVC(121);                                                      0103 00068000
         SVC   121                                                 0103 00069000
*   RRPL=PLHCRPL;                   /* RESTORE RPL PTR FOR EOV RTN   */ 00070000
         L     RRPL,PLHCRPL(,RPLH)                                 0104 00071000
*                                                                  0105 00072000
*/********************************************************************/ 00073000
*/*                                                                  */ 00074000
*/*       WAIT IF END OF VOLUME PROCESSING IS IN PROGRESS            */ 00075000
*/*                                                                  */ 00076000
*/********************************************************************/ 00077000
*                                                                  0105 00078000
*EOVTEST:                                                          0105 00079000
*   IF R15=EOVINP|                  /* R15 HAS RETURN CODE FROM SIOD */ 00080000
*       R15=DREAMB THEN             /* DEFER FOR AMB         @Z30SSMR*/ 00081000
EOVTEST  C     R15,@CF00038                                        0105 00082000
         BE    @RT00105                                            0105 00083000
         C     R15,@CF00043                                        0105 00084000
         BNE   @RF00105                                            0105 00085000
@RT00105 DS    0H                                                  0106 00086000
*     DO;                           /* EOV IN PROGRESS               */ 00087000
*                                                                  0107 00088000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00089000
*       /*                                                           */ 00090000
*       /* SET DEFERRED REQUEST INDICATOR IN RWORK0 AND CALL DEFERRED*/ 00091000
*       /* REQUEST ROUTINE. ON RETURN, GO BACK AND START AT          */ 00092000
*       /* BEGINNING.                                                */ 00093000
*       /*                                                           */ 00094000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00095000
*                                                                  0107 00096000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0107 00097000
*         RWORK3 RSTD;              /* GET REGS              @Z30SSMR*/ 00098000
*       IF R15=DREAMB THEN          /* IF REQUEST FOR AMB    @Z30SSMR*/ 00099000
         C     R15,@CF00043                                        0108 00100000
         BNE   @RF00108                                            0108 00101000
*         DO;                       /*                       @Z30SSMR*/ 00102000
*           RWORK3=ADDR(IDAAMB);    /* POINT TO AMB          @Z30SSMR*/ 00103000
         LR    RWORK3,RAMB                                         0110 00104000
*           RWORK0=EIGHT;           /* DEFER FOR AMB         @Z30SSMR*/ 00105000
         LA    RWORK0,8                                            0111 00106000
*         END;                      /* END OF AMB DEFER      @Z30SSMR*/ 00107000
*       ELSE                        /* MUST BE IOB DEFER     @Z30SSMR*/ 00108000
*         RWORK0=DREQPR;                                           0113 00109000
         B     @RC00108                                            0113 00110000
@RF00108 LA    RWORK0,4                                            0113 00111000
*I01:                                                              0114 00112000
*       DO;                         /* IDACALL(IDADRQ)               */ 00113000
@RC00108 DS    0H                                                  0114 00114000
I01      DS    0H                                                  0115 00115000
*         CALL IDADRQ;              /* EXIT TO IDADRQ                */ 00116000
         L     @15,@CV00033                                        0115 00117000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0115 00118000
*         GEN(BALR @11,0);          /* LOAD ADDR OF REENTRY          */ 00119000
         BALR @11,0                                                     00120000
*         GEN(USING *,@11);         /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSING          */ 00121000
         USING *,@11                                                    00122000
*         GEN(L     @11,=A(@PSTART));/* RELOAD BASE                  */ 00123000
         L     @11,=A(@PSTART)                                          00124000
*         GEN(USING @PSTART,@11);   /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSING          */ 00125000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                              00126000
*       END I01;                                                   0120 00127000
*       RFY                                                        0121 00128000
*         RWORK3 UNRSTD;            /* DROP REGISTER         @Z30SSMR*/ 00129000
*       GO TO SCHDSIOD;             /* START OVER FROM TOP   @Z30SSMR*/ 00130000
         B     SCHDSIOD                                            0122 00131000
*     END;                                                         0123 00132000
*   ELSE                                                           0124 00133000
*                                                                  0124 00134000
*/********************************************************************/ 00135000
*/*                                                                  */ 00136000
*/*       CALL END OF VOLUME PROCESSING IF NECESSARY                 */ 00137000
*/*                                                                  */ 00138000
*/********************************************************************/ 00139000
*                                                                  0124 00140000
*     IF R15=EOVREQ THEN            /* R15 HAS RETURN CODE FROM SIOD */ 00141000
@RF00105 C     R15,@CF00041                                        0124 00142000
         BNE   @RF00124                                            0124 00143000
*       DO;                         /* CALL EOV                      */ 00144000
*I02:                                                              0126 00145000
*         DO;                       /* IDACALL(IDAEOVIF)             */ 00146000
I02      DS    0H                                                  0127 00147000
*           CALL IDAEOVIF;          /* EXIT TO IDAEOVIF              */ 00148000
         L     @15,@CV00034                                        0127 00149000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0127 00150000
*           GEN(BALR @11,0);        /* LOAD ADDR OF REENTRY          */ 00151000
         BALR @11,0                                                     00152000
*           GEN(USING *,@11);       /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSING          */ 00153000
         USING *,@11                                                    00154000
*           GEN(L     @11,=A(@PSTART));/* RELOAD BASE                */ 00155000
         L     @11,=A(@PSTART)                                          00156000
*           GEN(USING @PSTART,@11); /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSING          */ 00157000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                              00158000
*         END I02;                                                 0132 00159000
*         GO TO SCHDSIOD;           /* GO BACK TO THE START  @Z30SSMR*/ 00160000
         B     SCHDSIOD                                            0133 00161000
*       END;                                                       0134 00162000
*                                                                  0135 00163000
*/********************************************************************/ 00164000
*/*                                                                  */ 00165000
*/*         RESET REGISTERS AND RETURN                               */ 00166000
*/*                                                                  */ 00167000
*/********************************************************************/ 00168000
*                                                                  0135 00169000
*EXIT:                                                             0135 00170000
*   RBUFC=IOMBUFC;                  /* RESTORE BUFC POINTER          */ 00171000
@RF00124 DS    0H                                                  0135 00172000
EXIT     L     RBUFC,IOMBUFC(,RPARM1)                              0135 00173000
*   RRPL=PLHCRPL;                   /* RESTORE RPL POINTER           */ 00174000
         L     RRPL,PLHCRPL(,RPLH)                                 0136 00175000
*   GEN SETS(R14,PLHRETO,PLHRET1)(IDARST14);/* RESTORE REG 14        */ 00176000
         IDARST14                                                       00177000
*   RETURN;                                                        0138 00178000
*                                                                  0138 00179000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0138 00180000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0138 00181000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0138 00182000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00183000
*   /*                                                               */ 00184000
*   /* MAINTENANCE PATCH SPACE                                       */ 00185000
*   /*                                                               */ 00186000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00187000
*                                                                  0139 00188000
*   GEN(DC    50X'00');                                            0139 00189000
         DC    50X'00'                                                  00190000

./  ADD  SSI=81790428,NAME=IDA019SB
         TITLE 'IDA019SB - DYNAMIC BUILD IDACPA                        *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA019SB CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA019SB  78.180'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @11,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                         0001 00012000
*                                                          /*@Y30SDLC*/ 00013000
LSRCPAPL  EQU 254                   SUBPOOL FOR LSR          @ZA27961   00014000
GSRCPAPL  EQU 245                   SUBPOOL FOR GSR          @ZA27961   00015000
*   IOMSAVE5=R14;                   /* SAVE RETURN REGISTER  @Y30SDLC*/ 00016000
         ST    R14,IOMSAVE5(,RIOMB)                                0134 00017000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0135 00018000
*     R14 UNRESTRICTED;             /*                       @Y30SDLC*/ 00019000
*                                                                  0135 00020000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00021000
*   /*                                                               */ 00022000
*   /* ESTABLISH EXISTENCE OF AN FRR                         @Y30SDLC*/ 00023000
*   /*                                                               */ 00024000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00025000
*                                                                  0136 00026000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0136 00027000
*    (RW1,                                                         0136 00028000
*     RW2,                                                         0136 00029000
*     RW3) RSTD;                    /*                       @Y30SDLC*/ 00030000
*   RW1=ADDR(IDA121F7);             /*                       @Y30SDLC*/ 00031000
         LA    RW1,IDA121F7                                        0137 00032000
*   GEN SETS(RW1,RW2,RW3,FRRSCURR,FRRSFRRA,FRRSPARM) REFS(PSACSTK, 0138 00033000
*       PSALSFCC,FRRS,FRRSENTR,FRRSLAST,FRRSELEN)                  0138 00034000
*       (SETFRR  A,FRRAD=(RW1),WRKREGS=(RW2,RW3),PARMAD=(RW1));/*  0138 00035000
*                                                            @Y30SDLC*/ 00036000
         SETFRR  A,FRRAD=(RW1),WRKREGS=(RW2,RW3),PARMAD=(RW1)           00037000
*   IOMBADR=RIOMB;                  /* IOMB ADDR IN PARM FLD @Y30SDLC*/ 00038000
         ST    RIOMB,IOMBADR(,RW1)                                 0139 00039000
*   BASER11=BASE11;                 /* BASE REG FOR FRR      @Y30SDLC*/ 00040000
         ST    BASE11,BASER11(,RW1)                                0140 00041000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0141 00042000
*     RW4 RESTRICTED;               /*                       @ZA26357*/ 00043000
*   IF AMBGSR=ON THEN               /* IS GLOBAL SHR         @ZA26357*/ 00044000
         L     @12,IOMAMB(,RIOMB)                                  0142 00045000
         TM    AMBGSR(@12),B'00100000'                             0142 00046000
         BNO   @RF00142                                            0142 00047000
*     RW4=VSRTCPAH;                 /* WSHD FROM VSRT        @ZA26357*/ 00048000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0143 00049000
         IC    @12,IOMCKEY(,RIOMB)                                 0143 00050000
         SRL   @12,4                                               0143 00051000
         SLA   @12,3                                               0143 00052000
         L     @06,CVTPTR                                          0143 00053000
         L     @06,CVTCBSP(,@06)                                   0143 00054000
         L     @12,CBSVPTR(@12,@06)                                0143 00055000
         L     RW4,VSRTCPAH(,@12)                                  0143 00056000
*   ELSE                            /* IF LOCAL SHR          @ZA26357*/ 00057000
*     RW4=AMBCPA;                   /* LOAD IDAWSHD BASE     @ZA26357*/ 00058000
         B     @RC00142                                            0144 00059000
@RF00142 L     @12,IOMAMB(,RIOMB)                                  0144 00060000
         L     RW4,AMBCPA(,@12)                                    0144 00061000
*   IOMSAVE7=RW4;                   /* SAVE ADDR 1ST WSHD    @ZA26357*/ 00062000

         TM    BUFCFMT(RBUFC),B'01000000'                          0257 00433000
         BO    @RT00257                                            0257 00434000
         TM    LPMREPL(RW2),B'01000000'                            0257 00435000
         BNO   @RF00257                                            0257 00436000
@RT00257 DS    0H                                                  0258 00437000
*         DO;                                                      0258 00438000
*           CPAFWCNT=CPAVPL+RW3;    /* FORMAT WRITE CNT AREA FOLLOWS    00439000
*                                      VPL                           */ 00440000
         LR    @12,RW3                                             0259 00441000
         AL    @12,CPAVPL(,R1)                                     0259 00442000
         ST    @12,CPAFWCNT(,R1)                                   0259 00443000
*           CPAWSID=CPAFWCNT+CPABCINV*DWORDLEN;/* SEARCH IDS FOLLOW     00444000
*                                      FWCNT                         */ 00445000
         LH    @04,CPABCINV(,R1)                                   0260 00446000
         SLA   @04,3                                               0260 00447000
         ALR   @12,@04                                             0260 00448000
         ST    @12,CPAWSID(,R1)                                    0260 00449000
*         END;                                                     0261 00450000
*       ELSE                        /* OTHERWISE                     */ 00451000
*         CPAWSID=CPAVPL+RW3;       /* SET ADDR OF SEARCH ID TABLE   */ 00452000
         B     @RC00257                                            0262 00453000
@RF00257 LR    @12,RW3                                             0262 00454000
         AL    @12,CPAVPL(,R1)                                     0262 00455000
         ST    @12,CPAWSID(,R1)                                    0262 00456000
         EJECT                                                          00457000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0263 00458000
*        (R6,                                                      0263 00459000
*         RW1,                                                     0263 00460000
*         R4) RESTRICTED;                                          0263 00461000
@RC00257 DS    0H                                                  0264 00462000
*       IF BUFCMW=ON THEN           /* IF WRITE REQUEST              */ 00463000
         TM    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'10000000'                           0264 00464000
         BNO   @RF00264                                            0264 00465000
*         DO;                                                      0265 00466000
*           IF BUFCFMT=OFF&         /* IF PREFORMAT NOT REQUESTED    */ 00467000
*               LPMREPL=OFF THEN    /* IF REPLICATION NOT REQUESTED  */ 00468000
         TM    BUFCFMT(RBUFC),B'01000000'                          0266 00469000
         BNZ   @RF00266                                            0266 00470000
         TM    LPMREPL(RW2),B'01000000'                            0266 00471000
         BNZ   @RF00266                                            0266 00472000
*             DO;                                                  0267 00473000
*                                                                  0267 00474000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00475000
*               /*                                                   */ 00476000
*               /* BUILD UPDATE WRITE CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT        */ 00477000
*               /*                                                   */ 00478000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00479000
*                                                                  0268 00480000
*               RW3=CPAWCPS;        /* POINT TO FIRST CCW            */ 00481000
         L     RW3,CPAWCPS(,R1)                                    0268 00482000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0269 00483000
*                 CCW BASED(RW3);   /* SET UP SEEK HEAD CCW          */ 00484000
*               R4=ADDR(CPAWSEEK);  /* SET POINTER TO SEEK ARG       */ 00485000
         LA    R4,CPAWSEEK(,R1)                                    0270 00486000
*               CALL BLDSEEKH;      /* BUILD SEEKH CCW               */ 00487000
         BAL   @14,BLDSEEKH                                        0271 00488000
*               CCWAREA=ADDR(CPAWSECT);/* POINT TO WRITE SECTOR      */ 00489000
         LA    @12,CPAWSECT(,R1)                                   0272 00490000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0272 00491000
*               CALL BLDSS;         /* BUILD REST OF SET SECTOR      */ 00492000
         BAL   @14,BLDSS                                           0273 00493000
*               RW1=CPAWSID;        /* POINT TO SEARCH ID ARGS       */ 00494000
         L     RW1,CPAWSID(,R1)                                    0274 00495000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0275 00496000
*                 SEARCHID BASED(RW1);                             0275 00497000
*               R4=CPAIDAL;         /* POINT TO REAL PAGE LIST       */ 00498000
         L     R4,CPAIDAL(,R1)                                     0276 00499000
*               RFY                                                0277 00500000
*                 R15 RSTD;         /*                       @ZA27961*/ 00501000
*               R15=(CPABLKSZ+PAGE-1)&-PAGE;/* ROUND UP      @ZA27961*/ 00502000
         L     R15,CPABLKSZ(,R1)                                   0278 00503000
         SL    R15,@CF02227                                        0278 00504000
         N     R15,@CF02228                                        0278 00505000
*               R15=(R15/PAGE+1)*FOUR;/* SIZE OF IDAL SET    @ZA27961*/ 00506000
         LR    @14,R15                                             0279 00507000
         SRL   @14,11                                              0279 00508000
         AL    @14,@CF00054                                        0279 00509000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0279 00510000
         LR    R15,@14                                             0279 00511000
*               DO R6=CPABCINV TO 1 BY-1;/* BUILD 3 CCW/BLKSIZE OR 2K*/ 00512000
         LH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0280 00513000
         B     @DE00280                                            0280 00514000
@DL00280 DS    0H                                                  0281 00515000
*                 CCWAREA=ADDR(SEARCHID);/* AREA IS IN SEARCH ID ARG    00516000
*                                      TABLE                         */ 00517000
         ST    RW1,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0281 00518000
*                 IF R6=CPABCINV THEN/* IF FIRST SET OF 3 CCWS       */ 00519000
         CH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0282 00520000
         BNE   @RF00282                                            0282 00521000
*                   CCWCODE=CCSIDEQ;/* NO MT ON                      */ 00522000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'31'                                  0283 00523000
*                 ELSE              /* IF NOT FIRST                  */ 00524000
*                   CCWCODE=CCMTSIDE;/* MT ON                        */ 00525000
         B     @RC00282                                            0284 00526000
@RF00282 MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'B1'                                  0284 00527000
*                 RW1=RW1+LENGTH(SEARCHID);/* PT TO NEXT SEARCH ID 0285 00528000
*                                      ARG                           */ 00529000
@RC00282 LA    @14,5                                               0285 00530000
         ALR   RW1,@14                                             0285 00531000
*                 CCWCC=ON;         /* SET COMMAND CHAINING BIT      */ 00532000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000000'                              0286 00533000
*                 CCWLEN=LENGTH(SEARCHID);/* SET SEARCH LENGTH       */ 00534000
         STH   @14,CCWLEN(,RW3)                                    0287 00535000
*                 CALL BLDTIC;      /* BUILD TIC                     */ 00536000
         BAL   @14,BLDTIC                                          0288 00537000
*                 CCWAREA=R4;       /* AREA IN IDAL                  */ 00538000
         ST    R4,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                    0289 00539000
*                 CCWCODE=CCWD;     /* SET COMMAND CODE              */ 00540000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'05'                                  0290 00541000
*                 CCWCC=ON;         /* SET COMMAND CHAINING BIT ON   */ 00542000
*                 CCWIDAL=ON;       /* SET IDAL BIT ON               */ 00543000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000100'                              0292 00544000
*                 CCWLEN=CPABLKSZ;  /* SET LENGTH                    */ 00545000
         L     @14,CPABLKSZ(,R1)                                   0293 00546000
         STH   @14,CCWLEN(,RW3)                                    0293 00547000
*                 R4=R4+R15;        /* NEXT IDAL SET         @ZA27961*/ 00548000
         ALR   R4,R15                                              0294 00549000
*                 RW3=RW3+LENGTH(CCW);/* POINT TO NEXT CCW           */ 00550000
         AL    RW3,@CF00061                                        0295 00551000
*               END;                /* BUILD NOP                     */ 00552000
         BCTR  R6,0                                                0296 00553000
@DE00280 LTR   R6,R6                                               0296 00554000
         BP    @DL00280                                            0296 00555000
*               RFY                                                0297 00556000
*                 R15 UNRSTD;       /*                       @ZA27961*/ 00557000
*               CPAWCPE=ADDR(CCW);  /* RESET POINTER TO LAST CCW     */ 00558000
         ST    RW3,CPAWCPE(,R1)                                    0298 00559000
*               CALL BLDNOP;        /* BUILD NOP                     */ 00560000
         BAL   @14,BLDNOP                                          0299 00561000
*             END;                                                 0300 00562000
         EJECT                                                          00563000
*           ELSE                    /* OTHERWISE, PREFORMAT IS REQ   */ 00564000
*             DO;                                                  0301 00565000
*                                                                  0301 00566000
         B     @RC00266                                            0301 00567000
@RF00266 DS    0H                                                  0302 00568000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00569000
*               /*                                                   */ 00570000
*               /* BUILD FORMAT WRITE CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT        */ 00571000
*               /*                                                   */ 00572000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00573000
*                                                                  0302 00574000
*               RW3=CPAWCPS;        /* POINT TO FIRST CCW            */ 00575000
         L     RW3,CPAWCPS(,R1)                                    0302 00576000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0303 00577000
*                 CCW BASED(RW3);   /* SET UP SEEK HEAD CCW          */ 00578000
*               R4=ADDR(CPAWSEEK);  /* POINT TO SEEK ARG             */ 00579000
         LA    R4,CPAWSEEK(,R1)                                    0304 00580000
*               CALL BLDSEEKH;      /* BUILD SEEK HEAD               */ 00581000
         BAL   @14,BLDSEEKH                                        0305 00582000
*               CCWAREA=ADDR(CPAWSECT);/* POINT TO WRITE SECTOR      */ 00583000
         LA    @12,CPAWSECT(,R1)                                   0306 00584000

*               CALL BLDSS;         /* BUILD REST OF SET SECTOR      */ 00586000
         BAL   @14,BLDSS                                           0307 00587000
*               CCWAREA=CPAWSID;    /* ADDRESS OF SEARCH ID          */ 00588000
         L     @12,CPAWSID(,R1)                                    0308 00589000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0308 00590000
*               CCWCODE=CCSIDEQ;    /* BUILD SEARCH ID EQU CCW       */ 00591000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'31'                                  0309 00592000
*               CCWCC=ON;           /* COMMAND CHAINING              */ 00593000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000000'                              0310 00594000
*               CCWLEN=LENGTH(CCHHR);/* LENGTH OF SEARCH ID          */ 00595000
         MVC   CCWLEN(2,RW3),@CH00093                              0311 00596000
*               CALL BLDTIC;        /* BUILD TIC                     */ 00597000
         BAL   @14,BLDTIC                                          0312 00598000
*               RW1=CPAFWCNT;       /* POINT TO FW COUNT AREA        */ 00599000
         L     RW1,CPAFWCNT(,R1)                                   0313 00600000
*               IF BUFCPFCP=ON|     /* IF PREFORMAT COMPLETE         */ 00601000
*                   LPMREPL=ON THEN /* IF REPLICATION REQUESTED      */ 00602000
         TM    BUFCPFCP(RBUFC),B'00000010'                         0314 00603000
         BO    @RT00314                                            0314 00604000
         TM    LPMREPL(RW2),B'01000000'                            0314 00605000
         BNO   @RF00314                                            0314 00606000
@RT00314 DS    0H                                                  0315 00607000
*                 R6=CPABCINV;      /* THEN MANY CCW SETS            */ 00608000
         LH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0315 00609000
*               ELSE                /* OTHERWISE                     */ 00610000
*                 R6=1;             /* IF NOT PREF COMP 1 SET CCWS   */ 00611000
         B     @RC00314                                            0316 00612000
@RF00314 LA    R6,1                                                0316 00613000
*               DO R6=R6 TO 1 BY-1; /* COMPLETE CCWS                 */ 00614000
@RC00314 B     @DE00317                                            0317 00615000
@DL00317 DS    0H                                                  0318 00616000
*                 CCWAREA=RW1;      /* POINT TO FW COUNT AREA        */ 00617000
         ST    RW1,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0318 00618000
*                 CCWCODE=CCWCKD;   /* BUILD WCKD CCW                */ 00619000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'1D'                                  0319 00620000
*                 RW1=RW1+DWORDLEN; /* POINT TO NEXT FW COUNT AREA   */ 00621000
         LA    @12,8                                               0320 00622000
         ALR   RW1,@12                                             0320 00623000
*                 CCWDC=ON;         /* DATA CHAINING                 */ 00624000
         OI    CCWDC(RW3),B'10000000'                              0321 00625000
*                 CCWLEN=LENGTH(CCHHRKDD);/* LENGTH OF DATA          */ 00626000
         STH   @12,CCWLEN(,RW3)                                    0322 00627000
*                 RW3=RW3+LENGTH(CCW);/* POINT TO NEXT CCW           */ 00628000
         ALR   RW3,@12                                             0323 00629000
*                 CCWAREA=CPAIDAL;  /* ADDR OF REAL PAGE LIST        */ 00630000
         L     @02,CPAIDAL(,R1)                                    0324 00631000
         ST    @02,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0324 00632000
*                 CCWCODE=CCWCKD;   /* BUILD 2ND WCKD CCW            */ 00633000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'1D'                                  0325 00634000
*                 CCWCC=ON;         /* COMMAND CHAINING              */ 00635000
*                 CCWIDAL=ON;       /* INDIRECT ADDRESSING           */ 00636000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000100'                              0327 00637000
*                 CCWLEN=CPABLKSZ;  /* DATA LENGTH EQUAL PHYSICAL  0328 00638000
*                                      BLOCK SIZE                    */ 00639000
         L     @02,CPABLKSZ(,R1)                                   0328 00640000
         STH   @02,CCWLEN(,RW3)                                    0328 00641000
*                 RW3=RW3+LENGTH(CCW);/* POINT TO NEXT CCW           */ 00642000
         ALR   RW3,@12                                             0329 00643000
*               END;                                               0330 00644000
         BCTR  R6,0                                                0330 00645000
@DE00317 LTR   R6,R6                                               0330 00646000
         BP    @DL00317                                            0330 00647000
*               CPAWCPE=ADDR(CCW);  /* RESET POINTER TO LAST CCW     */ 00648000
         ST    RW3,CPAWCPE(,R1)                                    0331 00649000
*               CALL BLDNOP;        /* BUILD NOP                     */ 00650000
         BAL   @14,BLDNOP                                          0332 00651000
*             END;                                                 0333 00652000
         EJECT                                                          00653000
*           IF BUFCWC=ON THEN       /* IF BUFC SPECIFIED WRITE CHECK */ 00654000
@RC00266 TM    BUFCWC(RBUFC),B'00001000'                           0334 00655000
         BNO   @RF00334                                            0334 00656000
*             DO;                                                  0335 00657000
*                                                                  0335 00658000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00659000
*               /*                                                   */ 00660000
*               /* BUILD WRITE CHECK CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT         */ 00661000
*               /*                                                   */ 00662000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00663000
*                                                                  0336 00664000
*               RW3=CPAWCKS;        /* POINT TO FIRST CCW AREA       */ 00665000

*               R4=ADDR(CPAWSEEK);  /* SET POINTER TO SEEK ARG       */ 00667000

*               CALL BLDSS;         /* BUILD REST OF SET SECTOR      */ 00674000
         BAL   @14,BLDSS                                           0340 00675000
*               IF BUFCFMT=ON|      /* IF PREFORMAT                  */ 00676000
*                   LPMREPL=ON THEN /* IF REPLICATION REQUESTED      */ 00677000

         BNO   @RF00341                                            0341 00681000
@RT00341 DS    0H                                                  0342 00682000
*                 CCWAREA=CPAFWCNT; /* LOAD ADDR OF FORMAT WRITE   0342 00683000
*                                      COUNT FIELD                   */ 00684000
         L     @12,CPAFWCNT(,R1)                                   0342 00685000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0342 00686000
*               ELSE                /* IF NOT PREFORMAT              */ 00687000
*                 CCWAREA=CPAWSID;  /* INIT AREA                     */ 00688000
         B     @RC00341                                            0343 00689000
@RF00341 L     @12,CPAWSID(,R1)                                    0343 00690000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0343 00691000
*               CCWCODE=CCSIDEQ;    /* COMMAND CODE IS SRCH ID EQ    */ 00692000
@RC00341 MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'31'                                  0344 00693000
*               CCWCC=ON;           /* COMMAND CHAINING              */ 00694000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000000'                              0345 00695000
*               CCWLEN=LENGTH(SEARCHID);/* SET CCW LENGTH            */ 00696000
         MVC   CCWLEN(2,RW3),@CH00093                              0346 00697000
*               CALL BLDTIC;        /* BUILD TIC                     */ 00698000
         BAL   @14,BLDTIC                                          0347 00699000
*               R4=CPAIDAL;         /* POINT TO IDAL AREA            */ 00700000
         L     R4,CPAIDAL(,R1)                                     0348 00701000
*               DO R6=CPABCINV TO 1 BY-1;/* CREATE RL CCWS           */ 00702000
         LH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0349 00703000
         B     @DE00349                                            0349 00704000
@DL00349 DS    0H                                                  0350 00705000
*                 CCWAREA=R4;       /* AREA IS IN IDAL               */ 00706000
         ST    R4,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                    0350 00707000
*                 IF R6=CPABCINV THEN/* IF THIS IS FIRST CCW         */ 00708000
         CH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0351 00709000
         BNE   @RF00351                                            0351 00710000
*                   CCWCODE=CCRD;   /* NO MT FOR FIRST CCW RD        */ 00711000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'06'                                  0352 00712000
*                 ELSE              /* IF NOT THE FIRST CCW          */ 00713000
*                   CCWCODE=CCMTRD; /* CCW CODE IS MT READ           */ 00714000
         B     @RC00351                                            0353 00715000
@RF00351 MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'86'                                  0353 00716000
*                 CCWCC=ON;         /* COMMAND CHAINING              */ 00717000
@RC00351 DS    0H                                                  0355 00718000
*                 CCWST=ON;         /* SUPPRESS DATA TRANSFER        */ 00719000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01010000'                              0355 00720000
*                 CCWLEN=CPABLKSZ;  /* SET LENGTH AS BLOCKSIZE       */ 00721000
         L     @12,CPABLKSZ(,R1)                                   0356 00722000
         STH   @12,CCWLEN(,RW3)                                    0356 00723000
*                 RW3=RW3+LENGTH(CCW);/* POINT TO NEXT CCW           */ 00724000
         AL    RW3,@CF00061                                        0357 00725000
*               END;                /* SET UP NOP                    */ 00726000
         BCTR  R6,0                                                0358 00727000
@DE00349 LTR   R6,R6                                               0358 00728000
         BP    @DL00349                                            0358 00729000
*               CPAWCKE=ADDR(CCW);  /* RESET POINTER TO LAST CCW     */ 00730000
         ST    RW3,CPAWCKE(,R1)                                    0359 00731000
*               CALL BLDNOP;        /* BUILD NOP                     */ 00732000
         BAL   @14,BLDNOP                                          0360 00733000
*             END;                                                 0361 00734000
*         END;                      /* END OF MW CODE                */ 00735000
@RF00334 DS    0H                                                  0363 00736000
         EJECT                                                          00737000
*       IF BUFCRRD=ON THEN          /* IF READ CHANNEL PROGRAM NEEDED*/ 00738000
@RF00264 TM    BUFCRRD(RBUFC),B'00100000'                          0363 00739000
         BNO   @RF00363                                            0363 00740000
*         DO;                                                      0364 00741000
*                                                                  0364 00742000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00743000
*           /*                                                       */ 00744000
*           /* BUILD READ CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT                    */ 00745000
*           /*                                                       */ 00746000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00747000
*                                                                  0365 00748000
*           RW3=CPARCPS;            /* POINT TO FIRST CCW            */ 00749000
         L     RW3,CPARCPS(,R1)                                    0365 00750000
*           R4=ADDR(CPARSEEK);      /* POINT TO SEEK ARG             */ 00751000
         LA    R4,CPARSEEK(,R1)                                    0366 00752000
*           CALL BLDSEEKH;          /* BUILD SEEK HEAD               */ 00753000
         BAL   @14,BLDSEEKH                                        0367 00754000
*           CCWAREA=ADDR(CPARSECT); /* POINT TO READ SECTOR          */ 00755000
         LA    @12,CPARSECT(,R1)                                   0368 00756000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0368 00757000
*           CALL BLDSS;             /* BUILD REST OF SET SECTOR      */ 00758000
         BAL   @14,BLDSS                                           0369 00759000
*           CCWAREA=ADDR(CPARSID);  /* POINT BACK TO HEADER          */ 00760000
         LA    @12,CPARSID(,R1)                                    0370 00761000
         ST    @12,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                   0370 00762000
*           CCWCODE=CCSIDEQ;        /* SET COMMAND CODE              */ 00763000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'31'                                  0371 00764000
*           CCWCC=ON;               /* COMMAND CHAINING BIT          */ 00765000
*           CCWSLI=ON;              /* SUPRESS INCORRECT LENGTH      */ 00766000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01100000'                              0373 00767000
*           CCWLEN=LENGTH(CPARSID); /* SET SEARCH ID ARG LENGTH      */ 00768000
         MVC   CCWLEN(2,RW3),@CH00093                              0374 00769000
*           CALL BLDTIC;            /* BUILD TIC                     */ 00770000
         BAL   @14,BLDTIC                                          0375 00771000
*           R4=CPAIDAL;             /* POINT TO FIRST OF IDAL        */ 00772000
         L     R4,CPAIDAL(,R1)                                     0376 00773000
*           RFY                                                    0377 00774000
*             R15 RSTD;             /*                       @ZA27961*/ 00775000
*           R15=(CPABLKSZ+PAGE-1)&-PAGE;/* ROUND UP          @ZA27961*/ 00776000
         L     R15,CPABLKSZ(,R1)                                   0378 00777000
         SL    R15,@CF02227                                        0378 00778000
         N     R15,@CF02228                                        0378 00779000
*           R15=(R15/PAGE+1)*FOUR;  /* SIZE OF IDAL SET      @ZA27961*/ 00780000
         LR    @14,R15                                             0379 00781000
         SRL   @14,11                                              0379 00782000
         AL    @14,@CF00054                                        0379 00783000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0379 00784000
         LR    R15,@14                                             0379 00785000
*           DO R6=CPABCINV TO 1 BY-1;/* 1 RD CCW/BLK/CINV            */ 00786000
         LH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0380 00787000
         B     @DE00380                                            0380 00788000
@DL00380 DS    0H                                                  0381 00789000
*             CCWAREA=R4;           /* CCW AREA IN IDAL              */ 00790000
         ST    R4,CCWAREA(,RW3)                                    0381 00791000
*             IF R6=CPABCINV THEN   /* IF FIRST CCW                  */ 00792000
         CH    R6,CPABCINV(,R1)                                    0382 00793000
         BNE   @RF00382                                            0382 00794000
*               CCWCODE=CCRD;       /* NO MT FOR FIRST READ DATA     */ 00795000
         MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'06'                                  0383 00796000
*             ELSE                  /* IF NOT FIRST CCW              */ 00797000
*               CCWCODE=CCMTRD;     /* MT ON                         */ 00798000
         B     @RC00382                                            0384 00799000
@RF00382 MVI   CCWCODE(RW3),X'86'                                  0384 00800000
*             CCWCC=ON;             /* CC ON AS USUAL                */ 00801000
@RC00382 DS    0H                                                  0386 00802000
*             CCWIDAL=ON;           /* SET IDAL BIT ON               */ 00803000
         OI    CCWCC(RW3),B'01000100'                              0386 00804000
*             CCWLEN=CPABLKSZ;      /* SET CCW LENGTH                */ 00805000

*   /*                                                               */ 01493000
*   /* MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT.                       @Y30SDLC*/ 01494000
*   /* REG 13 IS POINTED TO A SAVE AREA AT THE START OF THE 200-BYTE */ 01495000
*   /* WORK AREA AS REQUIRED FOR A BRANCH ENTRY IN THE SDUMP MACRO.  */ 01496000
*   /* RCPA (R4) POINTS TO THE END OF THE SAVE AREA WHERE SDUMP LIST */ 01497000
*   /* FORM IS MOVED TO BE EXECUTED. RBUFC (R5) CONTAINS THE ADDRESS */ 01498000

./  ADD  SSI=81730160,NAME=IDA019S4
         TITLE 'IDA019S4 DISABLED EXIT ROUTINE                         *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA019S4 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA019S4  78.173'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @15,@04,16(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         USING   IDA019S4,@15                                           00011000
*   IF IOSDIESE=ON THEN             /* SECOND ENTRY?                 */ 00012000
         TM    IOSDIESE(RIOSB),B'10000000'                         0088 00013000
         BO    @RT00088                                            0088 00014000
*     RETURN;                       /* EXIT                          */ 00015000
*                                                                  0089 00016000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00017000
*   /*                                                               */ 00018000
*   /* IF FIXED CONTROL BLOCKS OPTION, SRB MODE, AND NORMAL CHANNEL  */ 00019000
*   /* END - DEVICE END, THEN POST IOSB AND ECB AND SCHEDULE RESUME  */ 00020000
*   /* ROUTINE OF IDA019S1                                   @ZA10855*/ 00021000
*   /*                                                               */ 00022000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00023000
*                                                                  0090 00024000
*   IF SRBVFIX=ON&                  /* FIXED BLOCKS AND      @ZA10855*/ 00025000
*       IOMSRBM=ON&                 /* SRB MODE AND          @ZA10855*/ 00026000
*       IOSTATUS=CEDEND&            /* NORMAL STATUS?        @ZA10855*/ 00027000
*       IOSIPIB=ZERO THEN           /* PURGE NOT PROC        @ZA17946*/ 00028000
         L     @04,IOSSRB(,RIOSB)                                  0090 00029000
         TM    SRBVFIX(@04),B'10000000'                            0090 00030000
         BNO   @RF00090                                            0090 00031000
         L     @03,IOSUSE(,RIOSB)                                  0090 00032000
         TM    IOMSRBM(@03),B'00000010'                            0090 00033000
         BNO   @RF00090                                            0090 00034000
         CLC   IOSTATUS(2,RIOSB),@CB00061                          0090 00035000
         BNE   @RF00090                                            0090 00036000
         L     @01,IOSIPIB(,RIOSB)                                 0090 00037000
         LTR   @01,@01                                             0090 00038000
         BNZ   @RF00090                                            0090 00039000
*     DO;                           /* YES                           */ 00040000
*       IOSCOD=NRMCOD;              /* POST IOSB                     */ 00041000
         MVI   IOSCOD(RIOSB),X'7F'                                 0092 00042000
*       ECB=NRMCOD;                 /* POST ECB                      */ 00043000
         L     @01,IOMECBPT(,@03)                                  0093 00044000
         MVI   ECB(@01),X'7F'                                      0093 00045000
*       SRBEP=IOMPGAD;              /* ENTRY PT OF RESUME            */ 00046000
         L     @03,IOMPGAD(,@03)                                   0094 00047000
         ST    @03,SRBEP(,@04)                                     0094 00048000
*       SRBPARM=RIOSB;              /* PASS IOSB TO RESUME           */ 00049000
         ST    RIOSB,SRBPARM(,@04)                                 0095 00050000
*       RFY                                                        0096 00051000
*         R1 RSTD;                  /* LOCK REG                      */ 00052000
*       R1=IOSSRB;                  /* PT TO SRB                     */ 00053000
         LR    R1,@04                                              0097 00054000
*       GEN SETS(SRBFLNK,CVTLSMQ,R0,R15) REFS(CVTPTR);             0098 00055000
               LR  R3,R15                  SAVE BASE REG                00056000
               USING  IDA019S4,R3          ADDRESSIBILITY ACROS SCHE    00057000
               DROP @15                                                 00058000
               SCHEDULE SRB=(1)            SCHEDULE RESUME RTN          00059000
*       RFY                                                        0099 00060000
*         R1 UNRSTD;                /* UNLOCK REG                    */ 00061000
*       R14=R14+EIGHT;              /* INCR RTRN ADDR                */ 00062000

*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN                        */ 00065000
*                                                                  0102 00066000

@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0102 00068000
