./  ADD  SSI=81790422,NAME=IDA121A2
         TITLE 'IDA121A2--ACTUAL BLOCK PROCESSOR                       *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA121A2 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA121A2  78.179'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @11,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  LA    @12,4095(,@11)                                      0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                         0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART+4095,@12                                    0001 00013000
*   IOSBPTR=R1;                     /* SAVE IOSB POINTER             */ 00014000
         LR    IOSBPTR,R1                                          0200 00015000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0201 00016000
*     R1 UNRSTD;                                                   0201 00017000
*   IOMBPTR=IOSUSE;                 /* ESTABLISH IOMB POINTER        */ 00018000
         L     IOMBPTR,IOSUSE(,IOSBPTR)                            0202 00019000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0203 00020000
*    (IOSB) BASED(IOMIOSB);         /* ADDRESS OF IOSB               */ 00021000
*   IOMSAVED=R13;                   /* SAVE REGISTER 13 CONTENTS     */ 00022000
         ST    R13,IOMSAVED(,IOMBPTR)                              0204 00023000
*   IOMSAVE8=R14;                   /* SAVE RETURN REGISTER          */ 00024000
         ST    R14,IOMSAVE8(,IOMBPTR)                              0205 00025000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0206 00026000
*    (R13,                                                         0206 00027000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0206 00028000
*   IOMNBUF=ZERO;                   /* ZERO BUFC COUNT AREA          */ 00029000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0207 00030000
         STH   @10,IOMNBUF(,IOMBPTR)                               0207 00031000
*   IOMNSEG=ZERO;                   /* ZERO CP SEG COUNT AREA        */ 00032000
         STH   @10,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0208 00033000
*   RBUFC=IOMBUFC;                  /* SET BUFC POINTER REGISTER     */ 00034000
         L     RBUFC,IOMBUFC(,IOMBPTR)                             0209 00035000
*   RCPA=IOMCPA;                    /* SET CPA POINTER REGISTER      */ 00036000
*                                                                  0210 00037000
         L     RCPA,IOMCPA(,IOMBPTR)                               0210 00038000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00039000
*   /*                                                               */ 00040000
*   /* ESTABLISH EXISTENCE OF AN FRR                                 */ 00041000
*   /*                                                               */ 00042000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00043000
*                                                                  0211 00044000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0211 00045000
*    (RW1,                                                         0211 00046000
*     RW2,                                                         0211 00047000
*     RW3) RSTD;                                                   0211 00048000
*   RW1=ADDR(IDA121F2);                                            0212 00049000
         LA    RW1,IDA121F2                                        0212 00050000
*   GEN SETS(RW1,RW2,RW3,FRRSCURR,FRRSFRRA,FRRSPARM) REFS(PSACSTK, 0213 00051000
*       PSALSFCC,FRRS,FRRSENTR,FRRSLAST,FRRSELEN)                  0213 00052000
*       (SETFRR  A,FRRAD=(RW1),WRKREGS=(RW2,RW3),PARMAD=(RW1));    0213 00053000
         SETFRR  A,FRRAD=(RW1),WRKREGS=(RW2,RW3),PARMAD=(RW1)           00054000
*   IOMBADR=IOMBPTR;                /* IOMB ADDRESS INTO PARM FIELD  */ 00055000
         ST    IOMBPTR,IOMBADR(,RW1)                               0214 00056000
*   BASER11=R11;                    /* FIRST BASE REG VALUE FOR FRR  */ 00057000
         ST    R11,BASER11(,RW1)                                   0215 00058000
*   BASER12=R12;                    /* SECOND BASE REG VALUE FOR FRR */ 00059000
         ST    R12,BASER12(,RW1)                                   0216 00060000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0217 00061000
*    (RW2,                                                         0217 00062000
*     RW3) UNRSTD;                                                 0217 00063000
*                                                                  0217 00064000
*/*           BUILD CHANNEL PROGRAMS                                 */ 00065000
*                                                                  0218 00066000
*CPGEN:                                                            0218 00067000
*                                                                  0218 00068000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00069000
*   /*                                                               */ 00070000
*   /* IF BUFFER IS TO BE WRITTEN, BUILD CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT FOR */ 00071000
*   /* WRITE AND WRITE CHECK, IF REQUIRED                            */ 00072000
*   /*                                                               */ 00073000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00074000
*                                                                  0218 00075000
*   CPAFLAGS=ZERO;                                                 0218 00076000
CPGEN    SLR   @10,@10                                             0218 00077000
         STH   @10,CPAFLAGS(,RCPA)                                 0218 00078000
*   CPAWPHAD=CZERO;                 /* CLEAR WRITE ADDRESS AREA      */ 00079000
         XC    CPAWPHAD+1(7,RCPA),CPAWPHAD+1(RCPA)                 0219 00080000
         MVI   CPAWPHAD(RCPA),B'00000000'                          0219 00081000
*   CPARPHAD=CZERO;                 /* CLEAR READ ADDRESS AREA       */ 00082000
         XC    CPARPHAD+1(7,RCPA),CPARPHAD+1(RCPA)                 0220 00083000
         MVI   CPARPHAD(RCPA),B'00000000'                          0220 00084000
*   IOMNBUF=IOMNBUF+ONE;            /* INCREMENT BUFC COUNT          */ 00085000
         LA    @10,1                                               0221 00086000
         LH    @06,IOMNBUF(,IOMBPTR)                               0221 00087000
         N     @06,@CF03366                                        0221 00088000
         ALR   @10,@06                                             0221 00089000
         STH   @10,IOMNBUF(,IOMBPTR)                               0221 00090000
*   RBABIT=ON;                      /* VARIABLE LGTH IND     @Z30SSLP*/ 00091000
         OI    RBABIT(RCPA),B'10000000'                            0222 00092000
*   IF BUFCMW=ON THEN               /* WRITE REQUESTED               */ 00093000
*                                                                  0223 00094000
         TM    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'10000000'                           0223 00095000
         BNO   @RF00223                                            0223 00096000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00097000
*     /*                                                             */ 00098000
*     /* DO PRELIMINARY WRITE INITIALIZATION AND THEN BUILD FORMAT OR*/ 00099000
*     /* UPDATE WRITE CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT                        */ 00100000
*     /*                                                             */ 00101000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00102000
*                                                                  0224 00103000
*WRITE:                                                            0224 00104000
*     DO;                                                          0224 00105000
*                                                                  0224 00106000
WRITE    DS    0H                                                  0225 00107000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00108000
*       /*                                                           */ 00109000
*       /* SET MODE TO USER'S KEY WHILE SETTING BUFC BITS            */ 00110000
*       /*                                                           */ 00111000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00112000
*                                                                  0225 00113000
*       SPKA(IOMCKEY);              /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 00114000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0225 00115000
         IC    @10,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                               0225 00116000
         SPKA  0(@10)                                              0225 00117000
*       BUFCEPT=OFF;                /* TURN OFF IF I/O TO DO         */ 00118000
         NI    BUFCEPT(RBUFC),B'11111110'                          0226 00119000
*       GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);   /* RESET KEY TO 0        @Z40TSDT*/ 00120000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            00121000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0228 00122000
*        (R0,                                                      0228 00123000
*         RLPMB,                                                   0228 00124000
*         R6,                                                      0228 00125000
*         RW2,                                                     0228 00126000
*         RW3,                                                     0228 00127000
*         R15) RSTD;                                               0228 00128000
*                                                                  0228 00129000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00130000
*       /*                                                           */ 00131000
*       /* CONVERT CHANGES RLPMB,R6,RW1,RW2,RW3,R14,R15,CPASSECT     */ 00132000
*       /*                                                           */ 00133000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00134000
*                                                                  0229 00135000
*       R0=BUFCORBA;                /* OUTPUT RBA                    */ 00136000
         L     R0,BUFCORBA(,RBUFC)                                 0229 00137000
*       CALL CONVERT;               /* GO CONVERT RBA TO MBBCCHHR    */ 00138000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0230 00139000
*       CPAWSECT=CPASSECT;          /* SECTOR #              @Z30SSLP*/ 00140000
         IC    @14,CPASSECT(,RCPA)                                 0231 00141000
         STC   @14,CPAWSECT(,RCPA)                                 0231 00142000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0232 00143000
*        (R0,                                                      0232 00144000
*         R6,                                                      0232 00145000
*         RW1,                                                     0232 00146000
*         RW2,                                                     0232 00147000
*         RW3,                                                     0232 00148000
*         R15) UNRSTD;                                             0232 00149000
*       CPAWPHAD=CONVOUT;           /* SAVE SEEK ADDRESS             */ 00150000
*                                                                  0233 00151000
         MVC   CPAWPHAD(8,RCPA),CONVOUT(IOMBPTR)                   0233 00152000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00153000
*       /*                                                           */ 00154000
*       /* TEST IF RBA CONVERTED                                     */ 00155000
*       /*                                                           */ 00156000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00157000
*                                                                  0234 00158000
*       IF CONBB=ZERO THEN          /* EDB FOUND IN CONVERT ROUTINE  */ 00159000
*                                                                  0234 00160000
         ICM   @10,3,CONBB(IOMBPTR)                                0234 00161000
         BNZ   @RF00234                                            0234 00162000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00163000
*         /*                                                         */ 00164000
*         /* PROCESS WRITE CHANNEL PROGRAM                           */ 00165000
*         /*                                                         */ 00166000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00167000
*                                                                  0235 00168000
*DOWRITE:                                                          0235 00169000
*         DO;                                                      0235 00170000
DOWRITE  DS    0H                                                  0236 00171000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0236 00172000
*            (SIDARG) BASED(RW4);                                  0236 00173000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0237 00174000
*            (RW4) RSTD;                                           0237 00175000
*           RW4=CPAWSID;            /* POINT TO SRCH ID ARG AREA     */ 00176000
         L     RW4,CPAWSID(,RCPA)                                  0238 00177000
*           SIDARG=CONSID;          /* SAVE FIRST SRCH ID ARG        */ 00178000
         MVC   SIDARG(5,RW4),CONSID(IOMBPTR)                       0239 00179000
*           IF LPMBTOFL=ON THEN     /* TRACK OVERFLOW                */ 00180000
         TM    LPMBTOFL(RLPMB),B'00010000'                         0240 00181000
         BNO   @RF00240                                            0240 00182000
*             CPATKOFL=ON;          /* TRACK OVERFLOW BIT IN CPA     */ 00183000
         OI    CPATKOFL(RCPA),B'00001000'                          0241 00184000
*           IF LPMREPL=ON&          /* REPLICATED WRITE      @Z30SSLC*/ 00185000
*               BUFCFMT=OFF&        /* REPL UPDATE WRITE     @Z30SSLC*/ 00186000
*               AMBLSR=OFF&AMBGSR=OFF THEN/* IF NO SHR RES   @Z30SSLC*/ 00187000
@RF00240 TM    LPMREPL(RLPMB),B'01000000'                          0242 00188000
         BNO   @RF00242                                            0242 00189000
         TM    BUFCFMT(RBUFC),B'01000000'                          0242 00190000
         BNZ   @RF00242                                            0242 00191000
         L     @02,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0242 00192000
         TM    AMBLSR(@02),B'01100000'                             0242 00193000
         BNZ   @RF00242                                            0242 00194000
*             DO;                                                  0243 00195000
*               CPAWREPL=ON;        /* REPL INDICATOR IN FIRST BUFC  */ 00196000
         OI    CPAWREPL(RCPA),B'10000000'                          0244 00197000
*               RW4=BUFCBAD;        /* SAVE BUFFER ADDRESS           */ 00198000
         L     RW4,BUFCBAD(,RBUFC)                                 0245 00199000
*               RBUFC=BUFDRPFB;     /* PREFORMATTED BUFC/CPA PTR     */ 00200000
*                                                                  0246 00201000
         L     @02,AMBBUFC(,@02)                                   0246 00202000
         L     RBUFC,BUFDRPFB(,@02)                                0246 00203000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00204000
*               /*                                                   */ 00205000
*               /* SET MODE TO USER KEY WHILE SETTING BUFC BITS      */ 00206000
*               /*                                                   */ 00207000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00208000
*                                                                  0247 00209000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0247 00210000
*                (RW2) RSTD;        /*                       @Z40TSDT*/ 00211000
*               SPKA(IOMCKEY);      /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 00212000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0248 00213000
         IC    @09,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                               0248 00214000
         SPKA  0(@09)                                              0248 00215000
*               BUFCBAD=RW4;        /* STORE BUFFER ADDR IN PF BUFC  */ 00216000
         ST    RW4,BUFCBAD(,RBUFC)                                 0249 00217000
*               BUFCMW=ON;          /* WRITE REQUEST ON IN PF-BUFC   */ 00218000
*               BUFCXEDB=OFF;                                      0251 00219000
         OI    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'10000000'                           0251 00220000
         NI    BUFCXEDB(RBUFC),B'11111011'                         0251 00221000
*               BUFCEPT=OFF;        /* TURN OFF BIT IN THIS BUFC     */ 00222000
         NI    BUFCEPT(RBUFC),B'11111110'                          0252 00223000
*               GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);/* RESET KEY TO ZERO        */ 00224000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            00225000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0254 00226000
*                (RW2) UNRSTD;      /*                       @Z40TSDT*/ 00227000
*               CPABLKSZ=LPMBLKSZ;  /* BLOCKSIZE IN PF-CPA           */ 00228000
         L     @02,LPMBLKSZ(,RLPMB)                                0255 00229000
         ST    @02,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0255 00230000
*             END;                                                 0256 00231000
*           IF LPMBRPS=ON THEN      /* RPS DEV?              @Z30SSLP*/ 00232000
@RF00242 TM    LPMBRPS(RLPMB),B'10000000'                          0257 00233000
         BNO   @RF00257                                            0257 00234000
*             CPAWRPS=ON;           /* INDICATE RPS DEVICE IN CPA    */ 00235000
*                                                                  0258 00236000
         OI    CPAWRPS(RCPA),B'00010000'                           0258 00237000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00238000
*           /*                                                       */ 00239000
*           /* FORMAT WRITE                                          */ 00240000
*           /*                                                       */ 00241000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00242000
*                                                                  0259 00243000
*           IF BUFCFMT=ON|          /* FORMAT WRITE ON       @Z30SSLC*/ 00244000
*               ((AMBLSR=ON|AMBGSR=ON)&LPMREPL=ON) THEN/* IF REPL  0259 00245000
*                                      WITH SHARED RESOURCES @Z30SSLC*/ 00246000
@RF00257 TM    BUFCFMT(RBUFC),B'01000000'                          0259 00247000
         BO    @RT00259                                            0259 00248000
         L     @02,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0259 00249000
         TM    AMBLSR(@02),B'01100000'                             0259 00250000
         BZ    @RF00259                                            0259 00251000
         TM    LPMREPL(RLPMB),B'01000000'                          0259 00252000
         BNO   @RF00259                                            0259 00253000
@RT00259 DS    0H                                                  0260 00254000
*             DO;                                                  0260 00255000
*                                                                  0260 00256000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00257000
*               /*                                                   */ 00258000
*               /* IF INDICATED, USE PREFORMATTED CP                 */ 00259000
*               /*                                                   */ 00260000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00261000
*                                                                  0261 00262000
*               IF BUFCPFCP=ON|     /*                       @Z30SSLC*/ 00263000
*                   ((AMBLSR=ON|AMBGSR=ON)&LPMREPL=ON) THEN/* IF REPL   00264000
*                                      WITH SHARED RESOURCES @Z30SSLC*/ 00265000
         TM    BUFCPFCP(RBUFC),B'00000010'                         0261 00266000
         BO    @RT00261                                            0261 00267000
         L     @02,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0261 00268000
         TM    AMBLSR(@02),B'01100000'                             0261 00269000
         BZ    @RF00261                                            0261 00270000
         TM    LPMREPL(RLPMB),B'01000000'                          0261 00271000
         BNO   @RF00261                                            0261 00272000
@RT00261 DS    0H                                                  0262 00273000
*                 DO;                                              0262 00274000
*                                                                  0262 00275000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00276000
*                   /*                                               */ 00277000
*                   /* THE CHANNEL PROGRAM IS ASSUMED TO BE THE      */ 00278000
*                   /* MAXIMUM SIZE REQUIRED TO WRITE ONE ENTIRE     */ 00279000
*                   /* TRACK OF EITHER DATA OR INDEX. THE REMAINDER  */ 00280000
*                   /* OF THE TRACK IS WRITTEN FROM THE BLOCK        */ 00281000
*                   /* DETERMINED BY THE CONVERTED RBA.              */ 00282000
*                   /*                                               */ 00283000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00284000
*                                                                  0263 00285000
*                   RFY                                            0263 00286000
*                    (RW1) RSTD;                                   0263 00287000
*                   RFY                                            0264 00288000
*                     CPACCW BASED(CPAWCPS);                       0264 00289000
*                   IF CPAWRPS=ON THEN/* USE SET SECT IF RPS         */ 00290000
         TM    CPAWRPS(RCPA),B'00010000'                           0265 00291000
         BNO   @RF00265                                            0265 00292000
*                     DO;                                          0266 00293000
*                       IOSVST=ADDR(CPACCWSS);/* ST ADDR     @Z30SSLP*/ 00294000
         L     @06,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0267 00295000
         L     @02,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                  0267 00296000
         LA    @02,CPACCWSS(,@02)                                  0267 00297000
         ST    @02,IOSVST(,@06)                                    0267 00298000
*                       CPAWSECT=ZERO;/* SCTR IS 0           @Z30SSLP*/ 00299000
         MVI   CPAWSECT(RCPA),X'00'                                0268 00300000
*                     END;                                         0269 00301000
*                   ELSE            /* NOT RPS                       */ 00302000
*                     IOSVST=ADDR(CPACCWSI);/* ST ADDR       @Z30SSLP*/ 00303000
         B     @RC00265                                            0270 00304000
@RF00265 L     @06,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0270 00305000
         L     @02,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                  0270 00306000
         LA    @02,CPACCWSI(,@02)                                  0270 00307000
         ST    @02,IOSVST(,@06)                                    0270 00308000
*                   IOSEEK=CPAWPHAD;/* START OF CP IN IOSB           */ 00309000
@RC00265 L     @06,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0271 00310000
         MVC   IOSEEK(8,@06),CPAWPHAD(RCPA)                        0271 00311000
*                   CPAWPHR=CPAWPHR-ONE;/* SEARCH PREVIOUS R         */ 00312000
         SLR   @06,@06                                             0272 00313000
         IC    @06,CPAWPHR(,RCPA)                                  0272 00314000
         BCTR  @06,0                                               0272 00315000
         STC   @06,CPAWPHR(,RCPA)                                  0272 00316000
*                   RW1=LPMBLKTR-CPAWPHR;/* NUMBER OF BLOCKS         */ 00317000
         LCR   @06,@06                                             0273 00318000
         AH    @06,LPMBLKTR(,RLPMB)                                0273 00319000
         LR    RW1,@06                                             0273 00320000
*                   RW4=CPAWSID;    /* BASE FOR SIDARG               */ 00321000
         L     RW4,CPAWSID(,RCPA)                                  0274 00322000
*                   SIDARG=CPAWCHR; /* BUILD SEARCH ID ARG           */ 00323000
*                                                                  0275 00324000
         MVC   SIDARG(5,RW4),CPAWCHR(RCPA)                         0275 00325000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00326000
*                   /*                                               */ 00327000
*                   /* BUILD FORMAT WRITE WCKD FIELDS                */ 00328000
*                   /*                                               */ 00329000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00330000
*                                                                  0276 00331000
*                   RESPECIFY                                      0276 00332000
*                    (CNTFLD) BASED(CPAWORK1);                     0276 00333000
*                   CPAWORK1=CPAFWCNT;                             0277 00334000
         L     @06,CPAFWCNT(,RCPA)                                 0277 00335000
         ST    @06,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0277 00336000
*                   CNTCCHHR=CPAWCHR;                              0278 00337000
         MVC   CNTCCHHR(5,@06),CPAWCHR(RCPA)                       0278 00338000
*                   CNTR=CNTR+ONE;  /* INCREMENT RECORD              */ 00339000
         LA    @02,1                                               0279 00340000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0279 00341000
         IC    @15,CNTR(,@06)                                      0279 00342000
         ALR   @02,@15                                             0279 00343000
         STC   @02,CNTR(,@06)                                      0279 00344000
*                   CNTK=ZERO;      /* KEY IS ALWAYS ZERO            */ 00345000
         MVI   CNTK(@06),X'00'                                     0280 00346000
*                   CNTDD=CPABLKSZ; /* DATA LENGTH                   */ 00347000
         L     @02,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0281 00348000
         STH   @02,CNTDD(,@06)                                     0281 00349000
*                   DO WHILE CNTR<LPMBLKTR;                        0282 00350000
         B     @DE00282                                            0282 00351000
@DL00282 DS    0H                                                  0283 00352000
*                     CPAWORK2=CPAWORK1+EIGHT;/* PNT NEXT ENTRY      */ 00353000
         L     @06,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0283 00354000
         LA    @02,8                                               0283 00355000
         ALR   @02,@06                                             0283 00356000
         ST    @02,CPAWORK2(,RCPA)                                 0283 00357000
*                     CPAWORK2->CNTFLD=CNTFLD;                     0284 00358000
         MVC   CNTFLD(8,@02),CNTFLD(@06)                           0284 00359000
*                     CPAWORK1=CPAWORK2;/* PTR NEXT ENTRY            */ 00360000
         ST    @02,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0285 00361000
*                     CNTR=CNTR+ONE;                               0286 00362000
         LA    @06,1                                               0286 00363000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0286 00364000
         IC    @15,CNTR(,@02)                                      0286 00365000
         ALR   @06,@15                                             0286 00366000
         STC   @06,CNTR(,@02)                                      0286 00367000
*                   END;                                           0287 00368000
*                                                                  0287 00369000
@DE00282 L     @06,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0287 00370000
         SLR   @02,@02                                             0287 00371000
         IC    @02,CNTR(,@06)                                      0287 00372000
         CH    @02,LPMBLKTR(,RLPMB)                                0287 00373000
         BL    @DL00282                                            0287 00374000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00375000
*                   /*                                               */ 00376000
*                   /* ONLY ONE BUFC IF THIS IS A PREFORMATTED WRITE */ 00377000
*                   /* CHANNEL PROGRAM                               */ 00378000
*                   /*                                               */ 00379000
*                   /*************************************************/ 00380000
*                                                                  0288 00381000
*                   RESPECIFY                                      0288 00382000
*                    (RW2) RSTD;                                   0288 00383000
*                   RW2=SIXTEEN*RW1;/* TWO CCW'S PER BLK-WRITE       */ 00384000
         LR    RW2,RW1                                             0289 00385000
         SLA   RW2,4                                               0289 00386000
*                   RW4=CPAWCPS+THIRTY2+RW2;/* PTR LAST WRITE CCW  0290 00387000
*                                                            @Z30SSLP*/ 00388000
         LA    @09,32                                              0290 00389000
         L     RW4,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                  0290 00390000
         ALR   RW4,@09                                             0290 00391000
         ALR   RW4,RW2                                             0290 00392000
*                   CPAWORK1=RW4;   /* PTR TO LAST WRITE CCW         */ 00393000
         ST    RW4,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0291 00394000
*                   IOMNSEG=IOMNSEG+ONE;/* COUNT SEGMENT             */ 00395000
         LA    @06,1                                               0292 00396000
         LH    @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0292 00397000
         N     @02,@CF03366                                        0292 00398000
         ALR   @02,@06                                             0292 00399000
         STH   @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0292 00400000
*                   CPAWV=ON;       /* SET WRITE CP VALID            */ 00401000
         OI    CPAWV(RCPA),B'10000000'                             0293 00402000
*                   IF BUFCWC=ON THEN/* WRITE-CHECK CP EXISTS        */ 00403000
         TM    BUFCWC(RBUFC),B'00001000'                           0294 00404000
         BNO   @RF00294                                            0294 00405000
*                     DO;                                          0295 00406000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0296 00407000
*                        (CCW) BASED(RW4);                         0296 00408000
*                       RW4=CPAWCKS;/* WRITE CHECK START             */ 00409000
*                                                                  0297 00410000
         L     @15,CPAWCKS(,RCPA)                                  0297 00411000
         LR    RW4,@15                                             0297 00412000
*                       /*********************************************/ 00413000
*                       /*                                           */ 00414000
*                       /* CHAIN WRITE CP TO WRITE-CHECK CP          */ 00415000
*                       /*                                           */ 00416000
*                       /*********************************************/ 00417000
*                                                                  0298 00418000
*                       RW4=CPAWORK1;/* PTR TO LAST WRITE CCW        */ 00419000
         L     @14,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0298 00420000
         LR    RW4,@14                                             0298 00421000
*                       IOMNSEG=IOMNSEG+ONE;/* COUNT SEGMENT         */ 00422000
         ALR   @02,@06                                             0299 00423000
         STH   @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0299 00424000
*                       CPAWCV=ON;  /* SET WRITE CHECK INDICATOR     */ 00425000
         OI    CPAWCV(RCPA),B'01000000'                            0300 00426000
*                       CCWCC=TIC;                                 0301 00427000
         MVI   CCWCC(RW4),B'00001000'                              0301 00428000
*                       CCWDA=CPAWCKS+SIXTEEN;/*             @Z30SSMR*/ 00429000
         LA    @06,16                                              0302 00430000
         ALR   @06,@15                                             0302 00431000
         STCM  @06,7,CCWDA(RW4)                                    0302 00432000
*                       CCWTICDA=CCWDA;/* SAVE VIRT ADDR             */ 00433000
         STCM  @06,7,CCWTICDA(RW4)                                 0303 00434000
*                       RW2=EIGHT*RW1;/* CHECK HAS 1 CCW PER BLK     */ 00435000
         LR    RW2,RW1                                             0304 00436000
         SLA   RW2,3                                               0304 00437000
*                       RW4=CPAWCKS+THIRTY2+RW2;/* LAST CHK CCW    0305 00438000
*                                                            @Z30SSLP*/ 00439000
         ALR   @15,@09                                             0305 00440000
         ALR   @15,RW2                                             0305 00441000
         LR    RW4,@15                                             0305 00442000
*                       CPAWORK2=RW4;/* POINT LAST CCW IN CHAIN      */ 00443000
         ST    RW4,CPAWORK2(,RCPA)                                 0306 00444000
*                     END;                                         0307 00445000
*                   CCW1=CCWNOP;    /* BUILD NOP CCW                 */ 00446000
@RF00294 MVC   CCW1(8,RW4),@CB00137                                0308 00447000
*                   GO TO STARTIOX; /* CHANNEL PGM COMPLETED @Z30SSLP*/ 00448000
         B     STARTIOX                                            0309 00449000
*                 END;              /* ONE BUFC FOR REPLICATED INDEX */ 00450000
*               ELSE                /* BUFCPFCP=OFF                  */ 00451000
*                                                                  0311 00452000
*                 /***************************************************/ 00453000
*                 /*                                                 */ 00454000
*                 /* SHOULD NOT BE A REPLICATED WRITE                */ 00455000
*                 /*                                                 */ 00456000
*                 /***************************************************/ 00457000
*                                                                  0311 00458000
*                 IF LPMREPL=ON THEN/* ERROR CONDITION               */ 00459000
@RF00261 TM    LPMREPL(RLPMB),B'01000000'                          0311 00460000
         BNO   @RF00311                                            0311 00461000
*                   DO;                                            0312 00462000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0313 00463000
*                      (RW1,                                       0313 00464000
*                       RW2) UNRSTD;                               0313 00465000
*                     RBUFC=IOMBUFC;/* SET SWITCHES IN THIS BUFC     */ 00466000
*                                                                  0314 00467000
         L     RBUFC,IOMBUFC(,IOMBPTR)                             0314 00468000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00469000
*                     /*                                             */ 00470000
*                     /* SET MODE TO USER KEY TO SET BUFC BITS       */ 00471000
*                     /*                                             */ 00472000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00473000
*                                                                  0315 00474000
*                     SPKA(IOMCKEY);/* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 00475000
         SLR   @02,@02                                             0315 00476000
         IC    @02,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                               0315 00477000
         SPKA  0(@02)                                              0315 00478000
*                     BUFCEPT=ON;   /* SET COMPLETE BIT ON           */ 00479000
         OI    BUFCEPT(RBUFC),B'00000001'                          0316 00480000
*                     BUFCMW=OFF;   /* WRITE REQUEST IN BUFC OFF     */ 00481000
         NI    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'01111111'                           0317 00482000
*                     BUFCER2=ON;   /* WRITE ERROR INDICATOR ON      */ 00483000
         OI    BUFCER2(RBUFC),B'00001000'                          0318 00484000
*                     GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);/* RESET KEY ZERO     */ 00485000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            00486000
*                     GO TO RETRN;                                 0320 00487000
         B     RETRN                                               0320 00488000
*                   END;                                           0321 00489000
*                 ELSE              /* BOTH BUFCPFCP AND LPMREPL OFF */ 00490000
*FMTWRITE:                                                         0322 00491000
*                   DO;                                            0322 00492000
*                                                                  0322 00493000
@RF00311 DS    0H                                                  0322 00494000
FMTWRITE DS    0H                                                  0323 00495000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00496000
*                     /*                                             */ 00497000
*                     /* BUILD FORMAT WRITE CHAN PROG SEG FORMAT     */ 00498000
*                     /* WRITE CHAN PROG SEG IS ALWAYS PREBUILT WITH */ 00499000
*                     /* 6 STANDARD CCW'S - SEEK, SS, SID, TIC, WCKD,*/ 00500000
*                     /* WCKD IF CONTROL INTERVAL SIZE = PHYSICAL    */ 00501000
*                     /* BLOCK SIZE, THE SEVENTH CCW IS A NOP EXCEPT */ 00502000
*                     /* WHEN TRACK OVERFLOW REQUIRES ADDITIONAL     */ 00503000
*                     /* CCW'S TO CROSS TRACK BOUNDARIES.            */ 00504000
*                     /*                                             */ 00505000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00506000
*                                                                  0323 00507000
*                     CPAWORK1=CPAFWCNT;                           0323 00508000
         L     @02,CPAFWCNT(,RCPA)                                 0323 00509000
         ST    @02,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0323 00510000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0324 00511000
*                      (CNTFLD) BASED(CPAWORK1);                   0324 00512000
*                                                                  0324 00513000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00514000
*                     /*                                             */ 00515000
*                     /* SET UP CORRECT VIRTUAL ADDRESSES IN STANDARD*/ 00516000
*                     /* BASE                                        */ 00517000
*                     /*                                             */ 00518000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00519000
*                                                                  0325 00520000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0325 00521000
*                      (FWCP) BASED(CPAWCPS);                      0325 00522000
*                     FWSKDA=ADDR(CPAWSEEK);                       0326 00523000
         L     @15,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                  0326 00524000
         LA    @14,CPAWSEEK(,RCPA)                                 0326 00525000
         STCM  @14,7,FWSKDA(@15)                                   0326 00526000
*                     FWSSDA=ADDR(CPAWSECT);/* SCTR ADDR     @Z30SSLP*/ 00527000
         LA    @14,CPAWSECT(,RCPA)                                 0327 00528000
         STCM  @14,7,FWSSDA(@15)                                   0327 00529000
*                     FWSIDDA=CPAWSID;                             0328 00530000
         MVC   FWSIDDA(3,@15),CPAWSID+1(RCPA)                      0328 00531000
*                     FWTICDA=ADDR(FWSID);                         0329 00532000
         LA    @14,FWSID(,@15)                                     0329 00533000
         STCM  @14,7,FWTICDA(@15)                                  0329 00534000
*                     FWCKCC=WCKD;  /* RESET WCKD COMMAND            */ 00535000
         MVI   FWCKCC(@15),B'00011101'                             0330 00536000
*                     FWCKD1DA=CPAFWCNT;                           0331 00537000
         STCM  @02,7,FWCKD1DA(@15)                                 0331 00538000
*                     FWCKD2DA=CPAIDAL;                            0332 00539000
         MVC   FWCKD2DA(3,@15),CPAIDAL+1(RCPA)                     0332 00540000
*                     FWCKCNT=CPABLKSZ;/* RESTORE COUNT              */ 00541000
*                                                                  0333 00542000
         L     @14,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0333 00543000
         STH   @14,FWCKCNT(,@15)                                   0333 00544000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00545000
*                     /*                                             */ 00546000
*                     /* SET UP 1ST COUNT FIELD                      */ 00547000
*                     /*                                             */ 00548000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00549000
*                                                                  0334 00550000
*                     CNTCCHHR=SIDARG;/* RW4 POINTS TO FIRST ARG     */ 00551000
         MVC   CNTCCHHR(5,@02),SIDARG(RW4)                         0334 00552000
*                     CNTK=ZERO;                                   0335 00553000
         MVI   CNTK(@02),X'00'                                     0335 00554000
*                     CNTDD=CPABLKSZ;                              0336 00555000
         STH   @14,CNTDD(,@02)                                     0336 00556000
*                     SIDARGR=SIDARGR-ONE;/* ADJUST SEARCH R         */ 00557000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0337 00558000
         IC    @09,SIDARGR(,RW4)                                   0337 00559000
         BCTR  @09,0                                               0337 00560000
         STC   @09,SIDARGR(,RW4)                                   0337 00561000
*                     CPAWPHR=SIDARGR;                             0338 00562000
         MVC   CPAWPHR(1,RCPA),SIDARGR(RW4)                        0338 00563000
*                     CPAWCPE=CPAWCPS+FORTY8;/* CHANNEL PROGRAM END     00564000
*                                                            @Z30SSLP*/ 00565000
         LA    @09,48                                              0339 00566000
         ALR   @09,@15                                             0339 00567000
         ST    @09,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0339 00568000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0340 00569000
*                      (RW2) RSTD;                                 0340 00570000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0341 00571000
*                      (IDAEDB) BASED(RW2);                        0341 00572000
*                     RW2=IOMSAVE0; /* PTR TO EDB FROM CONVERT       */ 00573000
         L     RW2,IOMSAVE0(,IOMBPTR)                              0342 00574000
*                     IF LPMBTOFL=ON&AMBPSDS=ON THEN/* TRK OVERFLOW  */ 00575000
         TM    LPMBTOFL(RLPMB),B'00010000'                         0343 00576000
         BNO   @RF00343                                            0343 00577000
         L     @09,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0343 00578000
         TM    AMBPSDS(@09),B'10000000'                            0343 00579000
         BNO   @RF00343                                            0343 00580000
*                       IF EDBTKBAL<CPABLKSZ THEN/* LAST TRK RECORD  */ 00581000
         L     @09,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0344 00582000
         CR    @09,@14                                             0344 00583000
         BNL   @RF00344                                            0344 00584000
*                         DO;                                      0345 00585000
*                                                                  0345 00586000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00587000
*                           /*                                       */ 00588000
*                           /* PREPARE FWCNT FIELDS                  */ 00589000
*                           /*                                       */ 00590000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00591000
*                                                                  0346 00592000
*                           CNTDD=EDBTKBAL;/* COUNT LESS THAN BLKSZ  */ 00593000
         STH   @09,CNTDD(,@02)                                     0346 00594000
*                           CPAWORK1=CPAWORK1+EIGHT;/* NEXT CNT FIELD*/ 00595000
         LA    @07,8                                               0347 00596000
         ALR   @02,@07                                             0347 00597000
         ST    @02,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0347 00598000
*                           CNTCCHH=SIDARGCH+ONE;/* INCREASE TRK CNT */ 00599000
         LA    @06,1                                               0348 00600000
         ICM   @01,15,SIDARGCH(RW4)                                0348 00601000
         ALR   @06,@01                                             0348 00602000
         STCM  @06,15,CNTCCHH(@02)                                 0348 00603000
*                           CNTR=ONE;/* FIRST RECORD ON TRACK        */ 00604000
         MVI   CNTR(@02),X'01'                                     0349 00605000
*                           CNTDD=CPABLKSZ-EDBTKBAL;/* COUNT VALUE   */ 00606000
         LR    @06,@14                                             0350 00607000
         SLR   @06,@09                                             0350 00608000
         STH   @06,CNTDD(,@02)                                     0350 00609000
*                           RW4=RW4+FIVE;/* PTR TO SECOND SIDARG     */ 00610000
         AL    RW4,@CF00074                                        0351 00611000
*                           SIDARGCH=CNTCCHH;/* SIDARG VALUE         */ 00612000
         MVC   SIDARGCH(4,RW4),CNTCCHH(@02)                        0352 00613000
*                           SIDARGR=ZERO;/* RECORD ZERO FOR SRCH     */ 00614000
*                                                                  0353 00615000
         MVI   SIDARGR(RW4),X'00'                                  0353 00616000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00617000
*                           /*                                       */ 00618000
*                           /* BUILD CCW'S FOR SRCH AND SPECIAL WCKD */ 00619000
*                           /*                                       */ 00620000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00621000
*                                                                  0354 00622000
*                           RESPECIFY                              0354 00623000
*                            (CCW) BASED(CPAWCPE);                 0354 00624000
*                           CPAWCPE=CPAWCPS+THIRTY2;/*       @Z30SSLP*/ 00625000
         LA    @02,32                                              0355 00626000
         ALR   @02,@15                                             0355 00627000
         ST    @02,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0355 00628000
*                           CCWCC=SWCKD;/* SPECIAL WCKD COMMAND      */ 00629000
         MVI   CCWCC(@02),B'00000001'                              0356 00630000
*                           CCWCNT2=EDBTKBAL;/* DATA CNT UNDER BLKSZ */ 00631000
         STH   @09,CCWCNT2(,@02)                                   0357 00632000
*                           RESPECIFY                              0358 00633000
*                            (RW3) RSTD;                           0358 00634000
*                           CPAWCPE=CPAWCPE+SIXTEEN;               0359 00635000
         LA    @06,16                                              0359 00636000
         ALR   @02,@06                                             0359 00637000
         ST    @02,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0359 00638000
*                           RW3=CPAWCPS+SIXTEEN;/* STRT      @Z30SSLP*/ 00639000
*                                                                  0360 00640000
         ALR   @15,@06                                             0360 00641000
         LR    RW3,@15                                             0360 00642000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00643000
*                           /*                                       */ 00644000
*                           /* NEED SRCH AND TIC TO FIND NEXT TRK    */ 00645000
*                           /*                                       */ 00646000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00647000
*                                                                  0361 00648000
*                           CCW=RW3->CCW;/* COPY SRCH AND TIC CCW'S  */ 00649000
         MVC   CCW(16,@02),CCW(RW3)                                0361 00650000
*                           CCWCC=SIDEQMT;/* MULTI-TRACK SEARCH      */ 00651000
         MVI   CCWCC(@02),B'10110001'                              0362 00652000
*                           CCWDA=RW4;/* SECOND SIDARG ADDRESS       */ 00653000
         STCM  RW4,7,CCWDA(@02)                                    0363 00654000
*                           CCWDA2=CPAWCPE;/* SRCH CCW PTR IN TIC CCW*/ 00655000
         STCM  @02,7,CCWDA2(@02)                                   0364 00656000
*                           RW3=RW3+SIXTEEN;                       0365 00657000
         ALR   RW3,@06                                             0365 00658000
*                           CPAWCPE=CPAWCPE+SIXTEEN;               0366 00659000
         ALR   @02,@06                                             0366 00660000
         ST    @02,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0366 00661000
*                           CCW=RW3->CCW;/* COPY WCKD CCW'S          */ 00662000
         MVC   CCW(16,@02),CCW(RW3)                                0367 00663000
*                           CCWCC=WCKD;/* RESTORE COMMAND            */ 00664000
         MVI   CCWCC(@02),B'00011101'                              0368 00665000
*                           CCWDA=CCWDA+EIGHT;/* ADDR OF 2ND FWCNT   */ 00666000
         L     @06,CCWDA-1(,@02)                                   0369 00667000
         LA    @06,0(,@06)                                         0369 00668000
         ALR   @07,@06                                             0369 00669000
         STCM  @07,7,CCWDA(@02)                                    0369 00670000
*                           IF CPABLKSZ=F4K THEN/* 4K BLOCKSIZE      */ 00671000
         C     @14,@CF00096                                        0370 00672000
         BNE   @RF00370                                            0370 00673000
*                             CCWDA2=CCWDA2+FOUR;/* NEXT ENTRY       */ 00674000
         LA    @15,4                                               0371 00675000
         L     @14,CCWDA2-1(,@02)                                  0371 00676000
         LA    @14,0(,@14)                                         0371 00677000
         ALR   @15,@14                                             0371 00678000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWDA2(@02)                                   0371 00679000
*                           ELSE    /* BLOCKSIZE LESS THAN 4K        */ 00680000
*                             DO;                                  0372 00681000
*                                                                  0372 00682000
         B     @RC00370                                            0372 00683000
@RF00370 DS    0H                                                  0373 00684000
*                               /*************************************/ 00685000
*                               /*                                   */ 00686000
*                               /* ONLY 4K BLOCKSIZE FOR TRK OVERFLOW*/ 00687000
*                               /*                                   */ 00688000
*                               /*************************************/ 00689000
*                                                                  0373 00690000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0373 00691000
*                                (R2) RSTD;                        0373 00692000
*                               R2=BLKSZERR;/* REASON CODE 28 IN R2  */ 00693000
         LA    R2,28                                               0374 00694000
*                               GEN REFS(IOMSAVE0)/* REGS IN IOMB    */ 00695000
*                                   (STM   0,15,IOMSAVE0(IOMBPTR));     00696000
         STM   0,15,IOMSAVE0(IOMBPTR)                                   00697000
*                               DO; /* ABEND(377) DUMP SYSTEM        */ 00698000
*                                 RESPECIFY                        0377 00699000
*                                  (GPR01F) RESTRICTED;            0377 00700000
*                                 GPR01F=((377)&'00000FFF'X)*4096;/*    00701000
*                                      COMP CODE IN BITS 8-19        */ 00702000
         L     GPR01F,@CF03354                                     0378 00703000
*                                 GPR01F=GPR01F|'80000000'X;/*     0379 00704000
*                                      DUMP/STEP/DUMPOPTS FLAG       */ 00705000
         O     GPR01F,@CF00146                                     0379 00706000
*                                 SVC(13);/* ISSUE ABEND SVC         */ 00707000
         SVC   13                                                  0380 00708000
*                                 RESPECIFY                        0381 00709000
*                                  (GPR01F) UNRESTRICTED;          0381 00710000
*                               END;/* ABEND(377) DUMP SYSTEM X'179'    00711000
*                                      ABEND                         */ 00712000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0383 00713000
*                                (R2) UNRSTD;                      0383 00714000
*                             END;                                 0384 00715000
*                                                                  0384 00716000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00717000
*                           /*                                       */ 00718000
*                           /* LIMITED TO 2K PER IDAL                */ 00719000
*                           /*                                       */ 00720000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00721000
*                                                                  0385 00722000
*                           IF EDBTKBAL<=F2K THEN/* BUILD 3 IDALS    */ 00723000
@RC00370 LA    @02,2048                                            0385 00724000
         L     @15,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0385 00725000
         CR    @15,@02                                             0385 00726000
         BH    @RF00385                                            0385 00727000
*                             DO;                                  0386 00728000
*                               IDAL(2)=IDAL(1)+EDBTKBAL;/* 2ND CCW  */ 00729000
         L     @14,CPAIDAL(,RCPA)                                  0387 00730000
         AL    @15,IDAL(,@14)                                      0387 00731000
         ST    @15,IDAL+4(,@14)                                    0387 00732000
*                               IDAL(3)=IDAL(1)+F2K;/* ALSO 2ND CCW  */ 00733000
         AL    @02,IDAL(,@14)                                      0388 00734000
         ST    @02,IDAL+8(,@14)                                    0388 00735000
*                             END;                                 0389 00736000
*                           ELSE    /* TRACK BALANCE GREATER THAN 2K */ 00737000
*                             DO;                                  0390 00738000
         B     @RC00385                                            0390 00739000
@RF00385 DS    0H                                                  0391 00740000
*                               IDAL(2)=IDAL(1)+F2K;/* FOR 1ST CCW   */ 00741000
         L     @02,CPAIDAL(,RCPA)                                  0391 00742000
         LA    @15,2048                                            0391 00743000
         AL    @15,IDAL(,@02)                                      0391 00744000
         ST    @15,IDAL+4(,@02)                                    0391 00745000
*                               IDAL(3)=IDAL(1)+EDBTKBAL;/* 2ND CCW  */ 00746000
         L     @15,IDAL(,@02)                                      0392 00747000
         AL    @15,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0392 00748000
         ST    @15,IDAL+8(,@02)                                    0392 00749000
*                             END;                                 0393 00750000
*                           CCWCNT2=CNTDD;/* COUNT IS BLK BALANCE    */ 00751000
@RC00385 L     @02,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0394 00752000
         L     @01,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0394 00753000
         LH    @15,CNTDD(,@01)                                     0394 00754000
         N     @15,@CF03366                                        0394 00755000
         STH   @15,CCWCNT2(,@02)                                   0394 00756000
*                           CPAWCPE=CPAWCPE+SIXTEEN;               0395 00757000
*                                                                  0395 00758000
         AL    @02,@CF00079                                        0395 00759000
         ST    @02,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0395 00760000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00761000
*                           /*                                       */ 00762000
*                           /* RESET TRACK BALANCE FOR NEW TRACK     */ 00763000
*                           /*                                       */ 00764000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00765000
*                                                                  0396 00766000
*                           EDBTKBAL=LPMBPTRK-CNTDD;               0396 00767000
         LCR   @15,@15                                             0396 00768000
         AL    @15,LPMBPTRK(,RLPMB)                                0396 00769000
         ST    @15,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0396 00770000
*                         END;                                     0397 00771000
*                                                                  0397 00772000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00773000
*                     /*                                             */ 00774000
*                     /* REDUCE TRACK BALANCE BY BLOCKSIZE AMOUNT    */ 00775000
*                     /*                                             */ 00776000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00777000
*                                                                  0398 00778000
*                       ELSE                                       0398 00779000
*                         EDBTKBAL=EDBTKBAL-CPABLKSZ;              0398 00780000
*                                                                  0398 00781000
         B     @RC00344                                            0398 00782000
@RF00344 L     @02,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0398 00783000
         SL    @02,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0398 00784000
         ST    @02,EDBTKBAL(,RW2)                                  0398 00785000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00786000
*                     /*                                             */ 00787000
*                     /* TRACK OVERFLOW LIMITED TO ONE BLOCK PER     */ 00788000
*                     /* CONTROL INTERVAL.                           */ 00789000
*                     /*                                             */ 00790000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00791000
*                                                                  0399 00792000
*                     ELSE                                         0399 00793000
*                       IF CPABCINV>1 THEN                         0399 00794000
*                                                                  0399 00795000
         B     @RC00343                                            0399 00796000
@RF00343 LH    @02,CPABCINV(,RCPA)                                 0399 00797000
         C     @02,@CF00065                                        0399 00798000
         BNH   @RF00399                                            0399 00799000
*                         /*******************************************/ 00800000
*                         /*                                         */ 00801000
*                         /* CONTINUE BUILDING FORMAT WRITE CP IF    */ 00802000
*                         /* MORE THAN ONE PHYSICAL BLOCK PER CINV.  */ 00803000
*                         /*                                         */ 00804000
*                         /*******************************************/ 00805000
*                                                                  0400 00806000
*CCWGEN:                                                           0400 00807000
*                         DO;                                      0400 00808000
CCWGEN   DS    0H                                                  0401 00809000
*                           RESPECIFY                              0401 00810000
*                            (RLPMB,                               0401 00811000
*                             RW2,                                 0401 00812000
*                             RW3) UNRSTD;                         0401 00813000
*                                                                  0401 00814000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00815000
*                           /*                                       */ 00816000
*                           /* IF MORE THAN ONE PHYSICAL BLOCK PER   */ 00817000
*                           /* CINV, MUST CONSTRUCT THE REST OF THE  */ 00818000
*                           /* CCW LIST                              */ 00819000
*                           /*                                       */ 00820000
*                           /*****************************************/ 00821000
*                                                                  0402 00822000
*                           RESPECIFY                              0402 00823000
*                            (R0,                                  0402 00824000
*                             R2) RSTD;                            0402 00825000
*                           R0=BUFCORBA;/* GET OUTPUT RBA            */ 00826000
         L     R0,BUFCORBA(,RBUFC)                                 0403 00827000
*                           DO R2=TWO TO CPABCINV;                 0404 00828000
         LA    R2,2                                                0404 00829000
         B     @DE00404                                            0404 00830000
@DL00404 DS    0H                                                  0405 00831000
*                             R0=R0+CPABLKSZ;/* NEXT RBA             */ 00832000
         AL    R0,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                  0405 00833000
*                             RESPECIFY                            0406 00834000
*                              (RW1,                               0406 00835000
*                               RW2,                               0406 00836000
*                               RW3,                               0406 00837000
*                               R6,                                0406 00838000
*                               R15) RSTD;                         0406 00839000
*                             CALL CONVERT;                        0407 00840000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0407 00841000
*                             RESPECIFY                            0408 00842000
*                              (RW1,                               0408 00843000
*                               RW2,                               0408 00844000
*                               RW3,                               0408 00845000
*                               R6,                                0408 00846000
*                               R15) UNRSTD;                       0408 00847000
*                             CPAWORK1=CPAWORK1+EIGHT;/* NEXT CNT FLD*/ 00848000
         LA    @01,8                                               0409 00849000
         L     @15,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0409 00850000
         ALR   @15,@01                                             0409 00851000
         ST    @15,CPAWORK1(,RCPA)                                 0409 00852000
*                             CNTCCHHR=CONSID;                     0410 00853000
         MVC   CNTCCHHR(5,@15),CONSID(IOMBPTR)                     0410 00854000
*                             CNTK=ZERO;                           0411 00855000
         MVI   CNTK(@15),X'00'                                     0411 00856000
*                             CNTDD=CPABLKSZ;                      0412 00857000
*                                                                  0412 00858000
         L     @14,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0412 00859000
         STH   @14,CNTDD(,@15)                                     0412 00860000
*                             /***************************************/ 00861000
*                             /*                                     */ 00862000
*                             /* NOT SAME TRACK AS PREVIOUS BLOCK SO */ 00863000
*                             /* MUST HAVE A SEARCH ID AND TIC       */ 00864000
*                             /*                                     */ 00865000
*                             /***************************************/ 00866000
*                                                                  0413 00867000
*                             IF CONCCHHÂ¬=SIDARGCH THEN            0413 00868000
         CLC   CONCCHH(4,IOMBPTR),SIDARGCH(RW4)                    0413 00869000
         BE    @RF00413                                            0413 00870000
*                               DO;                                0414 00871000
*                                 RW4=RW4+FIVE;/* NEXT SEARCH ARG    */ 00872000
         LA    @15,5                                               0415 00873000
         ALR   RW4,@15                                             0415 00874000
*                                 CCWCC=SIDEQMT;/* MULTI-TRACK SID   */ 00875000
         L     @14,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0416 00876000
         MVI   CCWCC(@14),B'10110001'                              0416 00877000
*                                 CCWDA=RW4;                       0417 00878000
         STCM  RW4,7,CCWDA(@14)                                    0417 00879000
*                                 CCWFLG=CZERO;/* CLEAR FLAGS        */ 00880000
         MVI   CCWFLG(@14),B'00000000'                             0418 00881000
*                                 CCWCCB=ON;/* COMMAND CHAIN         */ 00882000
         OI    CCWCCB(@14),B'01000000'                             0419 00883000
*                                 CCWCNT=FIVE;                     0420 00884000
         STH   @15,CCWCNT(,@14)                                    0420 00885000
*                                 SIDARGCH=CONCCHH;                0421 00886000
         MVC   SIDARGCH(4,RW4),CONCCHH(IOMBPTR)                    0421 00887000
*                                 SIDARGR=ZERO;/* MUST BE 1ST R    0422 00888000
*                                      NEXTRK                        */ 00889000
         MVI   SIDARGR(RW4),X'00'                                  0422 00890000
*                                 CPAWCPE=CPAWCPE+EIGHT;/* NEXT CCW  */ 00891000
         ALR   @14,@01                                             0423 00892000
         ST    @14,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0423 00893000
*                                 CCWCC=TIC;/* MUST TIC BACK TO SID  */ 00894000
         MVI   CCWCC(@14),B'00001000'                              0424 00895000
*                                 CCWDA=CPAWCPE-EIGHT;             0425 00896000
         LR    @15,@14                                             0425 00897000
         SLR   @15,@01                                             0425 00898000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWDA(@14)                                    0425 00899000
*                                 CPAWCPE=CPAWCPE+EIGHT;/* NEXT CCW  */ 00900000
         ALR   @14,@01                                             0426 00901000
         ST    @14,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0426 00902000
*                               END;                               0427 00903000
*                                                                  0427 00904000
*                             /***************************************/ 00905000
*                             /*                                     */ 00906000
*                             /* NOW BUILD 2 WCKD CCW-S FOR COUNT AND*/ 00907000
*                             /* DATA                                */ 00908000
*                             /*                                     */ 00909000
*                             /***************************************/ 00910000
*                                                                  0428 00911000
*                             CCWCC=WCKD;/* WRITE COUNT FIELD        */ 00912000
@RF00413 L     @01,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0428 00913000
         MVI   CCWCC(@01),B'00011101'                              0428 00914000
*                             CCWDA=CPAWORK1;                      0429 00915000
         MVC   CCWDA(3,@01),CPAWORK1+1(RCPA)                       0429 00916000

*                             CCWCC=WCKD;/* WRITE DATA FIELD         */ 00927000

*                             IF CPABLKSZ=F4K THEN                 0435 00929000

*                               CCWDA=CPAIDAL+(R2-ONE)*TWELVE;/*   0436 00932000
*                                                            @Z30SSLC*/ 00933000

         STCM  @15,7,CCWDA(@01)                                    0436 00938000
*                             ELSE  /* < 2K                  @Z30SSLC*/ 00939000
*                               CCWDA=CPAIDAL+(R2-ONE)*EIGHT;/*    0437 00940000
*                                                            @Z30SSLC*/ 00941000
         B     @RC00435                                            0437 00942000
@RF00435 L     @01,CPAWCPE(,RCPA)                                  0437 00943000

*                             CCWFLG=CZERO;/* CLEAR FLAGS            */ 00949000

*                             CCWCCB=ON;/* COMMAND CHAIN             */ 00952000
*                             CCWIDALB=ON;/* INDIRECT DATA ADDR      */ 00953000

*                           END;                                   0443 00961000
         AL    R2,@CF00065                                         0443 00962000

         BNH   @DL00404                                            0443 00964000
*                         END CCWGEN;                              0444 00965000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0445 00966000
*                      (RLPMB) RSTD;                               0445 00967000
@RF00399 DS    0H                                                  0445 00968000
