*                     RESPECIFY                                    0446 00970000
*                      (CCW) BASED(RLPMB);                         0446 00971000
*                                                                  0446 00972000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00973000
*                     /*                                             */ 00974000
*                     /* RESTORE CHECK DATA ADDRESSES TO VIRTUAL IF  */ 00975000
*                     /* NECESSARY                                   */ 00976000
*                     /*                                             */ 00977000
*                     /***********************************************/ 00978000
*                                                                  0447 00979000
*                     IF BUFCWC=ON THEN/* WRITE CHECK REQUEST        */ 00980000
         TM    BUFCWC(RBUFC),B'00001000'                           0447 00981000
         BNO   @RF00447                                            0447 00982000
*                       DO;                                        0448 00983000
*                         RLPMB=CPAWCKS;/* PTR TO CHECK CP           */ 00984000
         L     RLPMB,CPAWCKS(,RCPA)                                0449 00985000
*                         R2=CPAWREAL-CPAWCPS;/* REAL-VIRT ADDR DIFF */ 00986000
*                                                                  0450 00987000
         L     R2,CPAWREAL(,RCPA)                                  0450 00988000
         SL    R2,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                   0450 00989000
*                         /*******************************************/ 00990000
*                         /*                                         */ 00991000
*                         /* IF CCW ADDRESSES REAL,CHANGE TO VIRTUAL */ 00992000
*                         /*                                         */ 00993000
*                         /*******************************************/ 00994000
*                                                                  0451 00995000
*                         IF R2Â¬=ZERO THEN                         0451 00996000
         LTR   R2,R2                                               0451 00997000
         BZ    @RF00451                                            0451 00998000
*                           DO WHILE RLPMBÂ¬=CPAWCKE;               0452 00999000
         B     @DE00452                                            0452 01000000
@DL00452 DS    0H                                                  0453 01001000
*                             CCWDA=CCWDA-R2;/* SUBTRACT DIFFERENCE  */ 01002000
         L     @01,CCWDA-1(,RLPMB)                                 0453 01003000
         LA    @01,0(,@01)                                         0453 01004000
         SLR   @01,R2                                              0453 01005000
         STCM  @01,7,CCWDA(RLPMB)                                  0453 01006000
*                             RLPMB=RLPMB+EIGHT;/* PTR TO NEXT CCW   */ 01007000
         AL    RLPMB,@CF00076                                      0454 01008000
*                           END;                                   0455 01009000
@DE00452 C     RLPMB,CPAWCKE(,RCPA)                                0455 01010000
         BNE   @DL00452                                            0455 01011000
*                       END;                                       0456 01012000
@RF00451 DS    0H                                                  0457 01013000
*                     CPAWREAL=CPAWCPS;/* RESET TO VIRTUAL ADDR      */ 01014000
@RF00447 L     @01,CPAWCPS(,RCPA)                                  0457 01015000
         ST    @01,CPAWREAL(,RCPA)                                 0457 01016000
*                     RESPECIFY                                    0458 01017000
*                      (RLPMB) UNRSTD;                             0458 01018000
*                   END FMTWRITE;                                  0459 01019000
*             END;                                                 0460 01020000
*                                                                  0460 01021000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01022000
*           /*                                                       */ 01023000
*           /* BUILD UPDATE WRITE CHAN PROG SEG GENERATE REST OF SRCH*/ 01024000
*           /* ID ARGUMENTS                                          */ 01025000
*           /*                                                       */ 01026000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01027000
*                                                                  0461 01028000
*           ELSE                                                   0461 01029000
*             DO R2=TWO TO CPABCINV;                               0461 01030000
         B     @RC00259                                            0461 01031000
@RF00259 LA    R2,2                                                0461 01032000
         B     @DE00461                                            0461 01033000
@DL00461 DS    0H                                                  0462 01034000
*               R0=R0+CPABLKSZ;     /* RBA OF NEXT BLOCK             */ 01035000
         AL    R0,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                  0462 01036000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0463 01037000
*                (R6,                                              0463 01038000
*                 RW1,                                             0463 01039000
*                 RW2,                                             0463 01040000
*                 RW3,                                             0463 01041000
*                 R15) RSTD;                                       0463 01042000
*               CALL CONVERT;       /* CONVERT RBA TO MBBCCHHR       */ 01043000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0464 01044000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0465 01045000
*                (R6,                                              0465 01046000
*                 RW1,                                             0465 01047000
*                 RW2,                                             0465 01048000
*                 RW3,                                             0465 01049000
*                 R15) UNRSTD;                                     0465 01050000
*                                                                  0465 01051000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01052000
*               /*                                                   */ 01053000
*               /* MAY NEED TO TEST RESULT                           */ 01054000
*               /*                                                   */ 01055000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01056000
*                                                                  0466 01057000
*               RW4=RW4+FIVE;       /* POINT TO NEXT SLOT            */ 01058000
         AL    RW4,@CF00074                                        0466 01059000
*               SIDARG=CONSID;      /* STORE SRCH ARG                */ 01060000
         MVC   SIDARG(5,RW4),CONSID(IOMBPTR)                       0467 01061000
*             END;                                                 0468 01062000
         AL    R2,@CF00065                                         0468 01063000
@DE00461 CH    R2,CPABCINV(,RCPA)                                  0468 01064000
         BNH   @DL00461                                            0468 01065000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0469 01066000
*            (R0,                                                  0469 01067000
*             R2,                                                  0469 01068000
*             RW1,                                                 0469 01069000
*             RW4) UNRSTD;                                         0469 01070000
*                                                                  0469 01071000
@RC00259 DS    0H                                                  0470 01072000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01073000
*           /*                                                       */ 01074000
*           /* COUNT CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT AND SET CPA BIT ON      */ 01075000
*           /*                                                       */ 01076000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01077000
*                                                                  0470 01078000
*           IOMNSEG=IOMNSEG+ONE;    /* COUNT ONE CHAN PROG SEG       */ 01079000
         LA    @10,1                                               0470 01080000
         LH    @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0470 01081000
         N     @02,@CF03366                                        0470 01082000
         ALR   @02,@10                                             0470 01083000
         STH   @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0470 01084000
*           CPAWV=ON;               /* SET WRITE CHAN PROG VALID     */ 01085000
*                                                                  0471 01086000
         OI    CPAWV(RCPA),B'10000000'                             0471 01087000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01088000
*           /*                                                       */ 01089000
*           /* WRITE CHECK CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGEMENT                  */ 01090000
*           /*                                                       */ 01091000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01092000
*                                                                  0472 01093000
*           IF BUFCWC=ON THEN       /* WRITE CHECK SPECIFIED         */ 01094000
         TM    BUFCWC(RBUFC),B'00001000'                           0472 01095000
         BNO   @RF00472                                            0472 01096000
*             DO;                                                  0473 01097000
*               IOMNSEG=IOMNSEG+ONE;/* COUNT CHAN PROG SEG           */ 01098000
         ALR   @02,@10                                             0474 01099000
         STH   @02,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0474 01100000
*               CPAWCV=ON;          /* SET WRITE CHK CHAN PROG VALID */ 01101000
         OI    CPAWCV(RCPA),B'01000000'                            0475 01102000
*             END;                                                 0476 01103000
*         END DOWRITE;                                             0477 01104000
*                                                                  0477 01105000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01106000
*       /*                                                           */ 01107000
*       /* ** ERROR CODE FROM CONVERT ROUTINE - NO EDB FOUND         */ 01108000
*       /*                                                           */ 01109000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01110000
*                                                                  0478 01111000
*       ELSE                        /* CONBBÂ¬=ZERO SO MARK AS ERROR  */ 01112000
*         DO;                                                      0478 01113000
*                                                                  0478 01114000
         B     @RC00234                                            0478 01115000
@RF00234 DS    0H                                                  0479 01116000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01117000
*           /*                                                       */ 01118000
*           /* SET MODE TO USER KEY WHILE SETTING BUFC BITS          */ 01119000
*           /*                                                       */ 01120000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01121000
*                                                                  0479 01122000
*           SPKA(IOMCKEY);          /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 01123000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0479 01124000
         IC    @10,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                               0479 01125000
         SPKA  0(@10)                                              0479 01126000
*           BUFCXEDB=ON;            /* EDB NOT FOUND                 */ 01127000
         OI    BUFCXEDB(RBUFC),B'00000100'                         0480 01128000
*           BUFCEPT=ON;             /* POST                          */ 01129000
         OI    BUFCEPT(RBUFC),B'00000001'                          0481 01130000
*           BUFCMW=OFF;             /* DELETE WRITE                  */ 01131000
         NI    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'01111111'                           0482 01132000
*           GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);/* RESET KEY TO ZERO            */ 01133000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            01134000
*         END;                                                     0484 01135000
*     END WRITE;                                                   0485 01136000
*                                                                  0485 01137000
@RC00234 DS    0H                                                  0486 01138000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01139000
*   /*                                                               */ 01140000
*   /* CHECK FOR READ AND BUILD CHANNEL PROGRAM SEG IF REQUIRED      */ 01141000
*   /*                                                               */ 01142000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01143000
*                                                                  0486 01144000
*   IF BUFCXEDB=OFF THEN                                           0486 01145000
@RF00223 TM    BUFCXEDB(RBUFC),B'00000100'                         0486 01146000
         BNZ   @RF00486                                            0486 01147000
*READT:                                                            0487 01148000
*     DO;                                                          0487 01149000
READT    DS    0H                                                  0488 01150000
*       IF BUFCRRD=ON THEN          /* READ SPECIFIED                */ 01151000
*                                                                  0488 01152000
         TM    BUFCRRD(RBUFC),B'00100000'                          0488 01153000
         BNO   @RF00488                                            0488 01154000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01155000
*         /*                                                         */ 01156000
*         /* BUILD READ CHAN PROG SEG                                */ 01157000
*         /*                                                         */ 01158000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01159000
*                                                                  0489 01160000
*         DO;                                                      0489 01161000
*                                                                  0489 01162000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01163000
*           /*                                                       */ 01164000
*           /* SET MODE TO USER'S KEY WHILE SETTING BUFC BITS        */ 01165000
*           /*                                                       */ 01166000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01167000
*                                                                  0490 01168000
*           SPKA(IOMCKEY);          /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 01169000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0490 01170000
         IC    @10,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                               0490 01171000
         SPKA  0(@10)                                              0490 01172000
*           BUFCEPT=OFF;            /* TURN OFF IF I/O TO DO         */ 01173000
         NI    BUFCEPT(RBUFC),B'11111110'                          0491 01174000
*           GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);/* RESET KEY TO ZERO    @Z40TSDT*/ 01175000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            01176000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0493 01177000
*            (R0,                                                  0493 01178000
*             R6,                                                  0493 01179000
*             RLPMB,                                               0493 01180000
*             RW1,                                                 0493 01181000
*             RW2,                                                 0493 01182000
*             RW3,                                                 0493 01183000
*             R15) RSTD;                                           0493 01184000
*           R0=BUFCDDDD;            /* READ RBA                      */ 01185000
         L     R0,BUFCDDDD(,RBUFC)                                 0494 01186000
*           CALL CONVERT;           /* CONVERT RBA TO MBBCCHHR       */ 01187000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0495 01188000
*           CPARSECT=CPASSECT;      /* SAVE SECTR #          @Z30SSLP*/ 01189000

         STC   @14,CPARSECT(,RCPA)                                 0496 01191000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0497 01192000
*            (R0,                                                  0497 01193000
*             R6,                                                  0497 01194000
*             RW3,                                                 0497 01195000
*             R15) UNRSTD;                                         0497 01196000

*                                                                  0498 01198000
         MVC   CPARPHAD(8,RCPA),CONVOUT(IOMBPTR)                   0498 01199000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01200000
*           /*                                                       */ 01201000
*           /* TEST IF RBA CONVERTED                                 */ 01202000
*           /*                                                       */ 01203000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01204000
*                                                                  0499 01205000
*           IF CONBB=ZERO THEN      /* RBA CONVERTED - EDB FOUND     */ 01206000
         ICM   @10,3,CONBB(IOMBPTR)                                0499 01207000
         BNZ   @RF00499                                            0499 01208000
*DOREAD:                                                           0500 01209000
*             DO;                                                  0500 01210000

*               IF LPMBRPS=ON THEN  /* INDICATE RPS DEVICE           */ 01212000
         TM    LPMBRPS(RLPMB),B'10000000'                          0501 01213000

*                 CPARRPS=ON;                                      0502 01215000
         OI    CPARRPS(RCPA),B'00001000'                           0502 01216000
*               IF LPMBTOFL=ON THEN /* TRACK OVERFLOW                */ 01217000

         BNO   @RF00503                                            0503 01219000
*                 CPATKOFL=ON;      /* TRACK OVERFLOW BIT IN CPA     */ 01220000
*                                                                  0504 01221000
         OI    CPATKOFL(RCPA),B'00001000'                          0504 01222000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01223000
*               /*                                                   */ 01224000
*               /* SKIP FOR ICIP                                     */ 01225000
*               /*                                                   */ 01226000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01227000
*                                                                  0505 01228000
*               IF AMBICI=OFF       /* ICIP?                 @Z30SSLP*/ 01229000
*                 THEN                                             0505 01230000
@RF00503 L     @10,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0505 01231000
         TM    AMBICI(@10),B'00010000'                             0505 01232000
         BNZ   @RF00505                                            0505 01233000
*                 DO;               /* NO, CONTINUE          @Z30SSLP*/ 01234000
*                   RFY                                            0507 01235000
*                    (CCW) BASED(RW1);                             0507 01236000
*                   RFY                                            0508 01237000
*                     CPACCW BASED(CPARCPS);                       0508 01238000
*                   RW1=ADDR(CPACCWTC);/* PT TO TIC          @Z30SSLP*/ 01239000
         L     @10,CPARCPS(,RCPA)                                  0509 01240000
         LA    RW1,CPACCWTC(,@10)                                  0509 01241000
*                   RW2=CPARREAL-CPARCPS;/* OFFSET TO REAL ADDRESS   */ 01242000
         LCR   @10,@10                                             0510 01243000
         AL    @10,CPARREAL(,RCPA)                                 0510 01244000
         LR    RW2,@10                                             0510 01245000
*                   IF LPMREPL=ON THEN/* REPLICATION SPECIFIED       */ 01246000
         TM    LPMREPL(RLPMB),B'01000000'                          0511 01247000
         BNO   @RF00511                                            0511 01248000
*                     DO;                                          0512 01249000
*                       CPARREPL=ON;/* SET READ REPLICATION BIT ON   */ 01250000
         OI    CPARREPL(RCPA),B'01000000'                          0513 01251000
*                       CCWCC=READCNT;/* BUILD READCNT CCW           */ 01252000
         MVI   CCWCC(RW1),B'00010010'                              0514 01253000
*                       CCWDA=ADDR(CPABLKSZ)+RW2;/* READ POINTER IN     01254000
*                                      CCW                           */ 01255000
         LA    @10,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0515 01256000
         ALR   @10,RW2                                             0515 01257000
         STCM  @10,7,CCWDA(RW1)                                    0515 01258000
*                       CCWSLIB=ON; /* SUPPRESS LENGTH INDICATOR     */ 01259000
*                       CCWCCB=ON;  /* COMMAND CHAIN BIT             */ 01260000
         OI    CCWSLIB(RW1),B'01100000'                            0517 01261000
*                       CCWCNT=FOUR;/* COUNT FIELD TO READ CCHH ONLY */ 01262000
         MVC   CCWCNT(2,RW1),@CH00071                              0518 01263000
*                     END;                                         0519 01264000
*                   ELSE            /* NOT REPLICATED WRITE          */ 01265000
*                     DO;                                          0520 01266000
         B     @RC00511                                            0520 01267000
@RF00511 DS    0H                                                  0521 01268000
*                       CCWCC=TIC;  /* RESTORE TIC CCW               */ 01269000
         MVI   CCWCC(RW1),B'00001000'                              0521 01270000
*                       CCWDA=ADDR(CPACCWSI)+RW2;/* REAL POINTER IN     01271000
*                                      CCW                   @Z30SSLP*/ 01272000
         L     @10,CPARCPS(,RCPA)                                  0522 01273000
         LA    @10,CPACCWSI(,@10)                                  0522 01274000
         ALR   @10,RW2                                             0522 01275000
         STCM  @10,7,CCWDA(RW1)                                    0522 01276000
*                     END;                                         0523 01277000
*                 END;              /* END NOT ICIP          @Z30SSLP*/ 01278000
@RC00511 DS    0H                                                  0525 01279000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0525 01280000
*                (RLPMB,                                           0525 01281000
*                 RW1,                                             0525 01282000
*                 RW2) UNRSTD;                                     0525 01283000
@RF00505 DS    0H                                                  0526 01284000
*               IOMNSEG=IOMNSEG+ONE;/* COUNT CHAN PROG SEG           */ 01285000
         LA    @10,1                                               0526 01286000

         N     @02,@CF03366                                        0526 01288000
         ALR   @10,@02                                             0526 01289000
         STH   @10,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0526 01290000
*               CPARV=ON;           /* SET READ CHAN PROG SEG VALID  */ 01291000
         OI    CPARV(RCPA),B'00100000'                             0527 01292000
*             END DOREAD;                                          0528 01293000
*                                                                  0528 01294000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01295000
*           /*                                                       */ 01296000
*           /* TURN OFF BUFC INDICATORS SINCE EDB NOT FOUND          */ 01297000
*           /*                                                       */ 01298000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01299000
*                                                                  0529 01300000
*           ELSE                    /* CONBBÂ¬=ZERO SO MARK AS ERROR  */ 01301000
*             DO;                                                  0529 01302000
*                                                                  0529 01303000

*               /*****************************************************/ 01306000
*               /*                                                   */ 01307000
*               /* SET MODE TO USER KEY WHILE SETTING BUFC BITS      */ 01308000

         NI    BUFCRRD(RBUFC),B'11011111'                          0532 01319000

         TM    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'10000000'                           0533 01321000

*                 BUFCEPT=ON;       /* MARK REQUEST COMPLETE         */ 01323000

*             END;                                                 0536 01328000

*       /*                                                           */ 01335000

         BNO   @RF00538                                            0538 01340000
*         DO;                       /* CREATE IDAL                   */ 01341000

         L     @10,CPAIDAL(,RCPA)                                  0540 01343000

*         END;                                                     0542 01349000
*     END READT;                                                   0543 01350000
*                                                                  0543 01351000
@RF00538 DS    0H                                                  0544 01352000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01353000
*   /*                                                               */ 01354000
*   /* IF WE ARE NOT BACK TO THE FIRST YET, GO BACK AND GENERATE THE */ 01355000
*   /* CP SEGMENTS FOR THIS BUFFER                                   */ 01356000
*   /*                                                               */ 01357000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01358000
*                                                                  0544 01359000
*   RBUFC=BUFCNXT1;                 /* POINTER TO NEXT BUFC          */ 01360000
@RF00486 L     RBUFC,BUFCNXT1(,RBUFC)                              0544 01361000
*   RCPA=CPACPCHN;                  /* POINTER TO NEXT CPA           */ 01362000
*                                                                  0545 01363000
         L     RCPA,CPACPCHN(,RCPA)                                0545 01364000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01365000
*   /*                                                               */ 01366000
*   /* NOT BACK TO BEGINNING BUFFER SO PROCESS NEXT BUFC             */ 01367000
*   /*                                                               */ 01368000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01369000
*                                                                  0546 01370000
*   IF RBUFCÂ¬=IOMBUFC THEN                                         0546 01371000

         BNE   @RT00546                                            0546 01373000
*     GO TO CPGEN;                  /* REPEAT FOR NEXT BUFC          */ 01374000
*   RCPA=IOMCPA;                    /* SET CPA POINTER TO 1ST CP SEG */ 01375000
*                                                                  0548 01376000
         L     RCPA,IOMCPA(,IOMBPTR)                               0548 01377000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01378000
*   /*                                                               */ 01379000
*   /* IF NO FUNCTIONS WERE REQUESTED, RETURN                        */ 01380000
*   /*                                                               */ 01381000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01382000
*                                                                  0549 01383000
*   IF IOMNSEG=ZERO THEN                                           0549 01384000
         LH    @10,IOMNSEG(,IOMBPTR)                               0549 01385000
         N     @10,@CF03366                                        0549 01386000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0549 01387000
         BNZ   @RF00549                                            0549 01388000
*     DO;                                                          0550 01389000
*       IOMLOCK=OFF;                /* RESET LOCK                    */ 01390000
         MVI   IOMLOCK(IOMBPTR),B'00000000'                        0551 01391000
*       GO TO RETRN;                /* RETURN WITHOUT PROCESSING     */ 01392000
         B     RETRN                                               0552 01393000
*     END;                                                         0553 01394000
*                                                                  0554 01395000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01396000
*   /*                                                               */ 01397000
*   /* **** CHAIN CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENTS TOGETHER                  */ 01398000
*   /*                                                               */ 01399000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01400000
*                                                                  0554 01401000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0554 01402000
*    (R1,                                                          0554 01403000
*     R2,                                                          0554 01404000
*     RW1,                                                         0554 01405000
*     RLPMB) RSTD;                                                 0554 01406000
@RF00549 DS    0H                                                  0555 01407000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0555 01408000
*    (CCW) BASED(RLPMB);                                           0555 01409000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0556 01410000
*    (SIDARG) BASED(RW1);                                          0556 01411000
*                                                                  0556 01412000
*/* CHECK FIRST BUFC FOR CHANNEL PROGRAM SEGMENT                     */ 01413000
*/*                                                                  */ 01414000
*                                                                  0557 01415000
*CHAIN:                                                            0557 01416000
*   IF AMBICI=ON THEN               /* SPECIAL CHAINING FOR ICIP   0557 01417000
*                                                            @Z30SSLP*/ 01418000
CHAIN    L     @10,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0557 01419000
         TM    AMBICI(@10),B'00010000'                             0557 01420000

*             IFGRPL BASED(R2);     /* RPL ADDRESSABILITY    @ZA07549*/ 02520000
*           IF RPLASY=OFF&          /* SYN PROCESSING AND    @ZA07549*/ 02521000
*               RPLWAITX=ON THEN    /* WAITX ?               @ZA07549*/ 02522000
         TM    RPLASY(R2),B'00001000'                              0886 02523000
         BNZ   @RF00886                                            0886 02524000
         TM    RPLWAITX(R2),B'00000100'                            0886 02525000
         BNO   @RF00886                                            0886 02526000
*             DO;                   /* YES- USE USER'S ECB   @ZA07549*/ 02527000
*               IF RPLECBSW=ON THEN /* EXTERNAL ECB ?        @ZA07549*/ 02528000
         TM    RPLECBSW(R2),B'00000001'                            0888 02529000
         BNO   @RF00888                                            0888 02530000
*                 IOMECBPT=RPLECB;  /* YES- POINT TO IT      @ZA07549*/ 02531000
         L     @10,RPLECB(,R2)                                     0889 02532000
         ST    @10,IOMECBPT(,IOMBPTR)                              0889 02533000
*               ELSE                /* ECB IN RPL            @ZA07549*/ 02534000
*                 IOMECBPT=ADDR(RPLECB);/* POINT TO ECB IN RPL     0890 02535000
*                                                            @ZA07549*/ 02536000
*                                                                  0890 02537000
         B     @RC00888                                            0890 02538000
@RF00888 LA    @10,RPLECB(,R2)                                     0890 02539000
         ST    @10,IOMECBPT(,IOMBPTR)                              0890 02540000
*               /*****************************************************/ 02541000
*               /*                                                   */ 02542000
*               /* GET INTO USER KEY TO CLEAR ECB FLAG       @ZA07549*/ 02543000
*               /*                                                   */ 02544000
*               /*****************************************************/ 02545000
*                                                                  0891 02546000
*               R2=IOMCKEY;         /* USER KEY IN REG       @ZA07549*/ 02547000
@RC00888 SLR   R2,R2                                               0891 02548000
         IC    R2,IOMCKEY(,IOMBPTR)                                0891 02549000
*               GEN(MODESET  KEYADDR=(2));/* GET IN USER KEY @ZA07549*/ 02550000

*               ECBPOSTB=OFF;       /* CLEAR POST FLAG       @ZA07549*/ 02552000
         L     @10,IOMECBPT(,IOMBPTR)                              0893 02553000
         NI    ECBPOSTB(@10),B'10111111'                           0893 02554000
*               R2=ZERO;            /* BACK TO KEY ZERO      @ZA07549*/ 02555000
         SLR   R2,R2                                               0894 02556000
*               GEN(MODESET  KEYADDR=(2));/* RE-SET THE KEY  @ZA07549*/ 02557000
         MODESET  KEYADDR=(2)                                           02558000
*             END;                  /* END WAITX WITH SYN    @ZA07549*/ 02559000
*           ELSE                    /* NOT WAITX             @ZA07549*/ 02560000
*             DO;                   /* USE VSAM ECB          @ZA07549*/ 02561000
         B     @RC00886                                            0897 02562000
@RF00886 DS    0H                                                  0898 02563000
*               IOMECBPT=ADDR(IOMXRECB);/* POINT TO VSAM ECB @ZA07549*/ 02564000

*               ECBPOSTB=OFF;       /* CLEAR POST FLAG       @ZA07549*/ 02568000
         NI    ECBPOSTB(@10),B'10111111'                           0899 02569000
*             END;                  /* END - NOT WAITX       @ZA07549*/ 02570000
*         END;                      /* END - RPL PRESENT     @ZA07549*/ 02571000
*       ELSE                        /* NO PLH IN IOMB        @ZA07549*/ 02572000
*         DO;                       /* USE VSAM ECB          @ZA07549*/ 02573000
         B     @RC00883                                            0902 02574000
@RF00883 DS    0H                                                  0903 02575000
*           IOMECBPT=ADDR(IOMXRECB);/* POINT TO VSAM ECB     @ZA07549*/ 02576000
         L     @10,IOMUFLD(,IOMBPTR)                               0903 02577000
         LA    @10,IOMXRECB(,@10)                                  0903 02578000
         ST    @10,IOMECBPT(,IOMBPTR)                              0903 02579000
*           ECBPOSTB=OFF;           /* CLEAR POST FLAG       @ZA07549*/ 02580000
         NI    ECBPOSTB(@10),B'10111111'                           0904 02581000
*         END;                      /* END - NO PLH          @ZA07549*/ 02582000
*       RFY                                                        0906 02583000
*         R2 UNRSTD;                /* RELEASE REG           @ZA07549*/ 02584000
@RC00883 DS    0H                                                  0907 02585000
*     END;                          /* END CALLER REC MGMT   @ZA07549*/ 02586000
*   ELSE                            /* CALLER IS ASM                 */ 02587000
*     IOSOPT=NOLOCLOK;              /* NO LOCAL LOCK FOR APPENDAGES  */ 02588000

@RF00878 L     @10,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0908 02590000
         MVI   IOSOPT(@10),X'10'                                   0908 02591000
*/********************************************************************/ 02592000
*/*          NOW ISSUE STARTIO                                       */ 02593000
*/*                                                                  */ 02594000
*/* SAVE BASE AND IOMB POINTERS BEFORE CALLING IOS. REGISTER 13 IS   */ 02595000
*/* THE ONLY REGISTER GUARANTEED NOT TO CHANGE ACROSS THE INTERFACE. */ 02596000
*/*                                                                  */ 02597000
*                                                                  0909 02598000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0909 02599000
*    (R13) RSTD;                                                   0909 02600000
@RC00878 DS    0H                                                  0910 02601000
*   IOMSAVE9=R11;                   /* SAVE BASE REGISTER VALUE      */ 02602000
         ST    R11,IOMSAVE9(,IOMBPTR)                              0910 02603000
*   IOMSAVEA=R12;                   /* SAVE 2ND BASE REGISTER VALUE  */ 02604000
         ST    R12,IOMSAVEA(,IOMBPTR)                              0911 02605000
*   R13=IOMBPTR;                    /* POINTER TO IOMB IN REG 13     */ 02606000
         LR    R13,IOMBPTR                                         0912 02607000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0913 02608000
*    (R1) RSTD;                                                    0913 02609000
*   R1=IOSSRB;                      /* POINTER TO SRB INTO REG       */ 02610000
         L     @10,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0914 02611000
         L     R1,IOSSRB(,@10)                                     0914 02612000
*   GEN REFS(R1,CVTPTR,CVTMAP,CVTIXAVL,IOCOM,IOCSTIO);             0915 02613000
         STARTIO SRB=(1),TCB=SRB                                        02614000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0916 02615000
*    (R1) UNRSTD;                                                  0916 02616000
*                                                                  0916 02617000
*/* RESTORE BASE AND IOMBPTR REGISTERS                               */ 02618000
*/*                                                                  */ 02619000
*                                                                  0917 02620000
*   IOMBPTR=R13;                    /* RESTORE POINTER TO IOMB       */ 02621000
         LR    IOMBPTR,R13                                         0917 02622000
*   R11=IOMSAVE9;                   /* RESTORE 1ST BASE REG VALUE    */ 02623000
         L     R11,IOMSAVE9(,IOMBPTR)                              0918 02624000
*   R12=IOMSAVEA;                   /* RESTORE 2ND BASE REG VALUE    */ 02625000
         L     R12,IOMSAVEA(,IOMBPTR)                              0919 02626000
*   R13=IOMSAVED;                   /* RESTORE REG 13 VALUE FOR USER */ 02627000
         L     R13,IOMSAVED(,IOMBPTR)                              0920 02628000
*   AMDEXCP=AMDEXCP+ONE;            /* EXCP COUNT                    */ 02629000
*                                                                  0921 02630000

         ST    @02,AMDEXCP(,@10)                                   0921 02635000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02636000
*   /*                                                               */ 02637000
*   /* RELEASE FRR AND RETURN                                        */ 02638000
*   /*                                                               */ 02639000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02640000
*                                                                  0922 02641000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0922 02642000
*    (RW2,                                                         0922 02643000
*     RW3) RSTD;                                                   0922 02644000
*RETRN:                             /* DELETE FRR BEFORE RETURNING   */ 02645000
*   GEN SETS(RW2,RW3,FRRSCURR,FRRSELEN) REFS(PSACSTK,FRRS,FRRSEMP) 0923 02646000
*       (SETFRR  D,WRKREGS=(RW2,RW3));                             0923 02647000

*   RESPECIFY                                                      0924 02649000
*    (R0,                                                          0924 02650000
*     R1,                                                          0924 02651000

*   R1=IOMIOSB;                     /* RESTORE PTR TO IOSB IN REG 1  */ 02653000
         L     @15,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               0925 02654000
         LR    R1,@15                                              0925 02655000
*   R0=IOSSRB;                      /* RESTORE PTR TO SRB IN REG 0   */ 02656000
         L     R0,IOSSRB(,@15)                                     0926 02657000
*   R14=IOMSAVE8;                   /* RESTORE REG 14                */ 02658000
         L     R14,IOMSAVE8(,IOMBPTR)                              0927 02659000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0928 02660000
*    (R0,                                                          0928 02661000
*     R1,                                                          0928 02662000
*     RW2,                                                         0928 02663000
*     RW3,                                                         0928 02664000

*                                      PROBLEM WITH ABPTERM  @ZA01507*/ 02668000
         BR    14                                                       02669000
*                                                                  0930 02670000
*/********************************************************************/ 02671000
*/*                                                                  */ 02672000
*/* IN CASE OF A LOAD REAL ADDRESS TRANSLATE ERROR, A 179 ABEND IS   */ 02673000
*/* ISSUED WITH A REASON CODE OF 24 IN REGISTER 2.                   */ 02674000
*/*                                                                  */ 02675000
*/********************************************************************/ 02676000
*                                                                  0930 02677000
*PAGEOUT:                                                          0930 02678000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0930 02679000
*    (R2) RSTD;                                                    0930 02680000
PAGEOUT  DS    0H                                                  0931 02681000
*   R2=ERRLRA;                      /* REASON CODE INTO REGISTER 2   */ 02682000
         LA    R2,24                                               0931 02683000
*   GEN REFS(IOMSAVE0)              /* SAVE REGISTERS IN IOMB        */ 02684000
*       (STM   0,15,IOMSAVE0(IOMBPTR));                            0932 02685000
         STM   0,15,IOMSAVE0(IOMBPTR)                                   02686000
*   DO;                             /* ABEND(377) DUMP SYSTEM        */ 02687000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0934 02688000
*      (GPR01F) RESTRICTED;                                        0934 02689000
*     GPR01F=((377)&'00000FFF'X)*4096;/* COMP CODE IN BITS 8-19      */ 02690000
         L     GPR01F,@CF03354                                     0935 02691000
*     GPR01F=GPR01F|'80000000'X;    /* DUMP/STEP/DUMPOPTS FLAG       */ 02692000
         O     GPR01F,@CF00146                                     0936 02693000
*     SVC(13);                      /* ISSUE ABEND SVC               */ 02694000
         SVC   13                                                  0937 02695000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0938 02696000
*      (GPR01F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0938 02697000
*   END;                            /* ABEND(377) DUMP SYSTEM 179 HEX   02698000
*                                      ABEND                         */ 02699000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0940 02700000
*    (R2) UNRSTD;                                                  0940 02701000
*                                                                  0941 02702000
*/********************************************************************/ 02703000
*/*       THIS ROUTINE CHAINS A READ CHANNEL PROGRAM WHEN A          */ 02704000
*/*            READ REQUEST EXISTS.                                  */ 02705000
*/********************************************************************/ 02706000
*                                                                  0941 02707000
*CHAINRD:                                                          0941 02708000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);                               0941 02709000
         B     @PB00002                                            0941 02710000
CHAINRD  DS    0H                                                  0942 02711000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0942 02712000
*    (R1,                                                          0942 02713000
*     R2,                                                          0942 02714000
*     RW1,                                                         0942 02715000
*     RLPMB,                                                       0942 02716000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0942 02717000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0943 02718000
*    (CCW) BASED(RLPMB);                                           0943 02719000
*   CPARCPS->CCWCC2=NOP;            /* NOP SS                @Z30SSMR*/ 02720000
         L     @15,CPARCPS(,RCPA)                                  0944 02721000
         MVI   CCWCC2(@15),B'00000011'                             0944 02722000
*   CCWDA=CPARCPS;                  /* STORE ADDRESS IN CCW          */ 02723000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWDA(RLPMB)                                  0945 02724000
*   CCWCC=TIC;                      /* CHANGE NOP TO TIC             */ 02725000
         MVI   CCWCC(RLPMB),B'00001000'                            0946 02726000
*   CPACHNED=ON;                    /* BUFFER CP SEGMENTS CHAINED    */ 02727000
         OI    CPACHNED(RCPA),B'00000100'                          0947 02728000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0948 02729000
*    (PGMSTART) BASED(CPARCPS);                                    0948 02730000
*   IF PREVMBB(1)Â¬=CPARPHAD(1) THEN /* DIFFERENT DEVICE              */ 02731000
         CLC   PREVMBB(1,IOMBPTR),CPARPHAD(RCPA)                   0949 02732000
         BE    @RF00949                                            0949 02733000
*     PGMSTART=SEEK;                /* CHANGE FIRST CCW TO SEEK      */ 02734000
         MVI   PGMSTART(@15),B'00000111'                           0950 02735000
*   ELSE                            /* SAME DEVICE                   */ 02736000
*     IF PREVCC(1:2)Â¬=CPARPHAD(4:5) THEN/* DIFFERENT CYLINDER        */ 02737000
         B     @RC00949                                            0951 02738000
@RF00949 CLC   PREVCC(2,IOMBPTR),CPARPHAD+3(RCPA)                  0951 02739000

*       PGMSTART=SEEKCC;            /* START WITH CYLINDER SEEK      */ 02741000

*     ELSE                          /* SAME DEVICE AND CYLINDER      */ 02744000
*       IF PREVHH(1:2)Â¬=CPARPHAD(6:7) THEN/* DIFFERENT HEAD          */ 02745000
         B     @RC00951                                            0953 02746000

*         IF CPATKOFL=ON THEN       /* CHECK TRACK OVERFLOW          */ 02749000

         BNO   @RF00954                                            0954 02751000
*           DO;                                                    0955 02752000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0956 02753000
*              (RW2) RSTD;                                         0956 02754000
*             RW2=BUFCDDDD-PREVRBA; /* DIFFERENCE IN RBA             */ 02755000
         L     RW2,BUFCDDDD(,RBUFC)                                0957 02756000
         SL    RW2,PREVRBA(,IOMBPTR)                               0957 02757000
*             IF RW2=AMDCINV&CPARPHAD(8)=TWO THEN                  0958 02758000
         L     @15,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0958 02759000
         L     @15,AMBDSB(,@15)                                    0958 02760000
         C     RW2,AMDCINV(,@15)                                   0958 02761000
         BNE   @RF00958                                            0958 02762000
         CLI   CPARPHAD+7(RCPA),2                                  0958 02763000
         BNE   @RF00958                                            0958 02764000
*               CCWDA=CPARCPS+SIXTEEN;/* SKIP SK, SS         @Z30SSLP*/ 02765000
         LA    @15,16                                              0959 02766000
         AL    @15,CPARCPS(,RCPA)                                  0959 02767000
         STCM  @15,7,CCWDA(RLPMB)                                  0959 02768000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0960 02769000
*              (RW2) UNRSTD;                                       0960 02770000
@RF00958 DS    0H                                                  0961 02771000
*           END;                                                   0961 02772000
*         ELSE                      /* NOT TRACK OVERFLOW            */ 02773000
*           PGMSTART=SEEKHH;        /* NEED SEEK ON HEAD             */ 02774000
         B     @RC00954                                            0962 02775000
@RF00954 L     @15,CPARCPS(,RCPA)                                  0962 02776000
         MVI   PGMSTART(@15),B'00011011'                           0962 02777000
*       ELSE                        /* SAME DEVICE,CYLINDER, AND HEAD*/ 02778000
*         IF PREVR(1)<CPARPHAD(8) THEN                             0963 02779000
         B     @RC00953                                            0963 02780000
@RF00953 CLC   PREVR(1,IOMBPTR),CPARPHAD+7(RCPA)                   0963 02781000

*           CCWDA=CPARCPS+SIXTEEN;  /* SKIP SK, SS           @Z30SSLP*/ 02783000

*         ELSE                                                     0965 02787000
*                                                                  0965 02788000
*           /*********************************************************/ 02789000
*           /*                                                       */ 02790000
*           /* RECORD MAY BE ON PREVIOUS TRACK IF TRACK OVERFLOW     */ 02791000
*           /*                                                       */ 02792000
*           /*********************************************************/ 02793000
*                                                                  0965 02794000

*   PREVMBB(1:3)=CPARPHAD(1:3);     /* SAVE MBB FOR NEXT COMPARE     */ 02804000

*   IF CPABCINV>ONE THEN                                           0969 02809000

         C     @10,@CF00065                                        0969 02811000
         BNH   @RF00969                                            0969 02812000
*     DO;                                                          0970 02813000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0971 02814000

*         RW3,                                                     0977 02836000

         MVC   PREVCHR(5,IOMBPTR),CONSID(IOMBPTR)                  0978 02840000
*     END;                                                         0979 02841000
*   ELSE                                                           0980 02842000

         B     @RC00969                                            0980 02844000

*   RLPMB=CPARCPE;                  /* POINTER TO LAST READ CCW      */ 02846000

*   R2=R2+ONE;                      /* INCREMENT CP SEGMENT COUNT    */ 02848000
         AL    R2,@CF00065                                         0982 02849000
*   END CHAINRD;                                                   0983 02850000

@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0983 02852000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0983 02853000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0984 02854000
*    (RW1) UNRSTD;                                                 0984 02855000
*                                                                  0985 02856000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02857000
*   /*                                                               */ 02858000
*   /* CONVERT RBA INTO MBBCCHHR - INPUT - R0 CONTAINS THE RBA TO BE */ 02859000
*   /* CONVERTED OUTPUT - CONVERTED RBA IN CONVOUT LPMB POINTER IN   */ 02860000
*   /* RLPMB BB IS USED AS A RETURN CODE IF BB=ZERO, RBA IS CONVERTED*/ 02861000
*   /* IF BB=FOUR, EDB COULD NOT BE LOCATED FOR THE RBA CONVERT      */ 02862000
*   /* CHANGES REGISTERS R6, RW1, RW2, RW3, RLPMB, R15               */ 02863000
*   /*                                                               */ 02864000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02865000
*                                                                  0985 02866000
*CONVERT:                                                          0985 02867000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,NOSAVE);                               0985 02868000
CONVERT  DS    0H                                                  0986 02869000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0986 02870000
*    (R0,                                                          0986 02871000
*     R1,                                                          0986 02872000
*     R2,                                                          0986 02873000
*     R6,                                                          0986 02874000
*     RW4,                                                         0986 02875000
*     RLPMB,                                                       0986 02876000
*     R14) RESTRICTED;                                             0986 02877000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0987 02878000
*    (IDAEDBHD) BASED(RLPMB);                                      0987 02879000
*   RLPMB=AMBEDB;                                                  0988 02880000
         L     @15,IOMAMB(,IOMBPTR)                                0988 02881000
         L     RLPMB,AMBEDB(,@15)                                  0988 02882000

         ST    @07,IOMSAVEA(,IOMBPTR)                              0990 02889000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0991 02890000
*    (IDAEDB) BASED(RLPMB);                                        0991 02891000
*   RLPMB=RLPMB+LENGTH(IDAEDBHD);                                  0992 02892000
*                                                                  0992 02893000
         AL    RLPMB,@CF00076                                      0992 02894000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02895000
*   /*                                                               */ 02896000
*   /* TEST INPUT RBA AGAINST LOW AND HIGH RBA RANGE FOR EACH EDB    */ 02897000
*   /* ENTRY TO FIND CORRECT ONE                                     */ 02898000
*   /*                                                               */ 02899000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 02900000
*                                                                  0993 02901000
*   CPABLKSZ=ZERO;                  /* CLEAR                         */ 02902000
         SLR   @07,@07                                             0993 02903000
         ST    @07,CPABLKSZ(,RCPA)                                 0993 02904000
*   DO R6=IOMSAVE9 TO ONE BY-1;                                    0994 02905000
         LR    R6,@15                                              0994 02906000
         B     @DE00994                                            0994 02907000
@DL00994 DS    0H                                                  0995 02908000
*     IF R0=>EDBLORBA&R0=<EDBHIRBA THEN                            0995 02909000
*                                                                  0995 02910000
         L     @15,EDBLORBA(,RLPMB)                                0995 02911000
         CLR   R0,@15                                              0995 02912000

         BH    @RF00995                                            0995 02915000
*       /*************************************************************/ 02916000
*       /*                                                           */ 02917000
*       /* EDB FOUND - NOW SET UP MBBCCHHR                           */ 02918000
*       /*                                                           */ 02919000
*       /*************************************************************/ 02920000
*                                                                  0996 02921000
*       DO;                                                        0996 02922000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0997 02923000
*          (RW1) RESTRICTED;                                       0997 02924000
*         IOMSAVE1=ZERO;            /* ZERO 1ST WORD OF CONVOUT      */ 02925000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0998 02926000

*         CONM=EDBM;                /* M FROM EDB                    */ 02928000
         IC    @09,EDBM(,RLPMB)                                    0999 02929000
         STC   @09,CONM(,IOMBPTR)                                  0999 02930000
*         R6=EDBSTTRK;              /* SAVE STARTING TRACK           */ 02931000
         L     R6,EDBSTTRK(,RLPMB)                                 1000 02932000
*         RW1=R0-EDBLORBA;          /* RBA RELATIVE TO EXTENT        */ 02933000
         LCR   @15,@15                                             1001 02934000
         ALR   @15,R0                                              1001 02935000
         LR    RW1,@15                                             1001 02936000
*         IOMSAVE0=RLPMB;           /* SAVE PTR TO EDB FOR TRK OVERFL*/ 02937000
         ST    RLPMB,IOMSAVE0(,IOMBPTR)                            1002 02938000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1003 02939000
*          (IDALPMB) BASED(RLPMB);                                 1003 02940000
*         RLPMB=EDBLPMBA;                                          1004 02941000
*                                                                  1004 02942000
         L     RLPMB,EDBLPMBA(,RLPMB)                              1004 02943000
*/*                                                                  */ 02944000
*/* OPTIMIZE CODE BY USING ASSEMBLER CODE FOR DIVISION               */ 02945000
*/*                                                                  */ 02946000
*                                                                  1005 02947000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1005 02948000
*          (RW2,                                                   1005 02949000
*           RW3,                                                   1005 02950000
*           R15) RESTRICTED;                                       1005 02951000
*         GENERATE REFS(LPMAUSZ,LPMBPTRK);                         1006 02952000
*        CONCC=RW1/LPMAUSZ;                                             02953000
*        RW3=RW1//LPMAUSZ;                                              02954000
         LR    RW3,RW1            RBA RELATIVE TO EXTENT IN ODD         02955000
         SR    RW2,RW2                  ZERO EVEN REGISTER              02956000

*                                                                       02960000
*        CONHH=RW3/LPMBPTRK;                                            02961000
*        RW1=RW3//LPMBPTRK;                                             02962000
         SR    RW2,RW2                  ZERO EVEN REGISTER              02963000

         STH  RW3,CONHH(IOMBPTR)        ST RELREL TRK VALUE  @Z30SSLP   02965000
         LR    RW1,RW2                  REMAINDER INTO RW1 FOR SS RTN   02966000
*        RW3=(RW2+LPMBLKSZ-1)/LPMBLKSZ;  /* RECORD LESS 1            */ 02967000
         L     R15,LPMBLKSZ(,RLPMB)     BLOCKSIZE                       02968000
         AR    RW2,R15                  ADD BLOCKSIZE TO TRK REMAINDER  02969000
         BCTR  RW2,0                    REDUCE BY ONE                   02970000
         LR    RW3,RW2                  REMAINDER INTO ODD REGISTER     02971000
         SLR   RW2,RW2                  ZERO EVEN REGISTER FOR DIVISION 02972000
         DR    RW2,R15                  DIVIDE BY BLOCKSIZE             02973000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1007 02974000
*          (R15) UNRSTD;                                           1007 02975000
*         CONR=RW3+ONE;             /* RECORD STORED                 */ 02976000
         LA    @15,1                                               1008 02977000
         ALR   @15,RW3                                             1008 02978000
         STC   @15,CONR(,IOMBPTR)                                  1008 02979000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1009 02980000
*          (RW3) UNRSTD;                                           1009 02981000
*         RW2=CONCC*LPMTRKAU+CONHH+R6;                             1010 02982000
         SLR   RW2,RW2                                             1010 02983000
         ICM   RW2,3,CONCC(IOMBPTR)                                1010 02984000
         MH    RW2,LPMTRKAU(,RLPMB)                                1010 02985000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             1010 02986000
         ICM   @15,3,CONHH(IOMBPTR)                                1010 02987000
         ALR   RW2,@15                                             1010 02988000
         ALR   RW2,R6                                              1010 02989000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1011 02990000
*          (RW3,                                                   1011 02991000
*           R15) RESTRICTED;                                       1011 02992000
*         GENERATE REFS(LPMTPC);                                   1012 02993000
*        CONCC=RW2/LPMTPC;                                              02994000
*        CONHH=RW2//LPMTPC;                                             02995000
         LR    RW3,RW2                  LOAD ODD REGISTER               02996000
         SR    RW2,RW2                  ZERO EVEN REGISTER              02997000
         LH    R15,LPMTPC(,RLPMB)                                       02998000

         STH  RW2,CONHH(IOMBPTR)        REAL TRK VALUE - HH  @Z30SSLP   03001000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1013 03002000
*          (RW2,                                                   1013 03003000

*         GO TO SETSECTR;           /* EDB FOUND             @Z30SSLP*/ 03009000

*       END;                                                       1017 03013000
*     ELSE                                                         1018 03014000
*       RLPMB=RLPMB+IOMSAVEA;       /* NEXT EDB ENTRY                */ 03015000
@RF00995 AL    RLPMB,IOMSAVEA(,IOMBPTR)                            1018 03016000
*   END;                                                           1019 03017000
         BCTR  R6,0                                                1019 03018000
@DE00994 LTR   R6,R6                                               1019 03019000
         BP    @DL00994                                            1019 03020000
*   CONBB=FOUR;                     /* SET ERROR SINCE EDB NOT FOUND */ 03021000
         MVC   CONBB(2,IOMBPTR),@CH00071                           1020 03022000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      1021 03023000
*    (R0,                                                          1021 03024000
*     R6,                                                          1021 03025000
*     R14) UNRESTRICTED;            /*                       @Z30SSLP*/ 03026000
*                                                                  1021 03027000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03028000
*   /*                                                               */ 03029000
*   /* THIS ROUTINE USES EITHER THE LPMP SECTOR TABLE OR THE IECSCR1 */ 03030000
*   /* ROUTINE IN BLDL TO CONVERT THE RECORD NUMBER OF THE SEEK IN   */ 03031000
*   /* THE FIRST CHANNEL PROGRAM INTO ITS CORRESPONDING SECTOR VALUE.*/ 03032000
*   /* THEN IT IS STORED AT LOCATION CPASSECT FOR USE WITH AN I/O    */ 03033000
*   /* DEVICE HAVING THE RPS FEATURE.                                */ 03034000
*   /*                                                               */ 03035000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03036000
*                                                                  1022 03037000
*SETSECTR:                                                         1022 03038000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      1022 03039000
*    (R0,                                                          1022 03040000
*     R1,                                                          1022 03041000
*     RW1,                                                         1022 03042000
*     RLPMB,                                                       1022 03043000

SETSECTR DS    0H                                                  1023 03045000
*   IF LPMBRPS=ON THEN              /* RPS DEV?              @Z30SSLC*/ 03046000
         TM    LPMBRPS(RLPMB),B'10000000'                          1023 03047000
         BNO   @RF01023                                            1023 03048000
*     IF LPMBSSTH=ON THEN           /* SECT TBL PRESENT      @Z30SSLP*/ 03049000
         TM    LPMBSSTH(RLPMB),B'00001000'                         1024 03050000
         BNO   @RF01024                                            1024 03051000
*       DO;                         /*                       @Z30SSMR*/ 03052000
*         IF BUFCFMT=OFF THEN       /* IF FORMAT             @Z30SSMR*/ 03053000
         TM    BUFCFMT(RBUFC),B'01000000'                          1026 03054000
         BNZ   @RF01026                                            1026 03055000
*           CPASSECT=LPMBSST(CONR); /* SECTOR VAL            @Z30SSLC*/ 03056000

         IC    @06,LPMBSST-1(@15,RLPMB)                            1027 03060000
         STC   @06,CPASSECT(,RCPA)                                 1027 03061000
*         ELSE                      /* IF FORMAT WRITE       @Z30SSMR*/ 03062000
*           IF CONR>ONE THEN        /* IF NOT FIRST RECORD   @Z30SSMR*/ 03063000
         B     @RC01026                                            1028 03064000
@RF01026 CLI   CONR(IOMBPTR),1                                     1028 03065000

*             CPASSECT=LPMBSST(CONR-ONE);/* SET PREV SECTOR          */ 03067000

         STC   @06,CPASSECT(,RCPA)                                 1029 03072000
*           ELSE                    /* IF FIRST RECORD       @Z30SSMR*/ 03073000
*             CPASSECT=ZERO;        /* SET SECTOR ZERO       @Z30SSMR*/ 03074000
         B     @RC01028                                            1030 03075000
@RF01028 MVI   CPASSECT(RCPA),X'00'                                1030 03076000
*       END;                        /*                       @Z30SSMR*/ 03077000
*     ELSE                          /* TRK OFLO, CALL SECTOR CONVERT    03078000
*                                      RTN                   @Z30SSLP*/ 03079000
*       DO;                         /*                       @Z30SSLC*/ 03080000
         B     @RC01024                                            1032 03081000
@RF01024 DS    0H                                                  1033 03082000
*         IOMSAVE7=R14;             /* SAVE RETURN REG               */ 03083000
*                                                                  1033 03084000
         ST    R14,IOMSAVE7(,IOMBPTR)                              1033 03085000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03086000
*         /*                                                         */ 03087000
*         /* REQUEST BUILT WITH VARIABLE LENGTH RECORD FORMAT BUILD  */ 03088000
*         /* BBIR IN REGISTER 0 - RBA,KEY,RECORD             @ZA09141*/ 03089000
*         /*                                                         */ 03090000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03091000
*                                                                  1034 03092000
*         BB=RW1;                   /* RBA ON TRACK          @ZA09141*/ 03093000

*         RFY                                                      1035 03095000
*           RW1 UNRSTD;             /*                       @Z30SSLP*/ 03096000
*         I=CZERO;                  /* KEY IS ALWAYS ZERO    @ZA09141*/ 03097000
         MVI   I(IOMBPTR),B'00000000'                              1036 03098000
*         R=CONR;                   /* RECORD TO CONVERT     @ZA09141*/ 03099000
         IC    @15,CONR(,IOMBPTR)                                  1037 03100000

*         VLRBIT=ON;                /* VARIABLE LNG RECORDS  @ZA09141*/ 03102000

*                                                                  1039 03105000

*         /***********************************************************/ 03107000
*         /*                                                         */ 03108000
*         /* REG 2 NEEDS UCB DEVICE TYPE CODE AND ADDRESS OF 1-BYTE  */ 03109000
*         /* LOCATION TO STORE SECTOR VALUE                          */ 03110000
*         /*                                                         */ 03111000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03112000
*                                                                  1040 03113000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1040 03114000
*          (R2,                                                    1040 03115000
*           UCBPTR,                                                1040 03116000
*           DEBPTR,                                                1040 03117000
*           R15) RSTD;                                             1040 03118000
*         DEBPTR=AMBDEBPT;          /* ESTABLISH ADDR FOR DEB        */ 03119000

*         R15=ADDR(DEBBASND)+IOBM*LENGTH(DEBDASD);                 1042 03122000
         L     R15,AMBDEBAD-1(,@07)                                1042 03123000
