*         UCBPTR=R15->DEBUCBA;      /* PTR TO UCB                    */ 03131000
         L     UCBPTR,DEBUCBA-1(,R15)                              1043 03132000
         LA    UCBPTR,0(,UCBPTR)                                   1043 03133000
*         SSA=ADDR(CPASSECT);       /* PLACE FOR SECTOR VALUE        */ 03134000
         LA    @07,CPASSECT(,RCPA)                                 1044 03135000
         STCM  @07,7,SSA(IOMBPTR)                                  1044 03136000
*         U=UCBTBYT4;               /* UNIT TYPE FROM UCB            */ 03137000
         MVC   U(1,IOMBPTR),UCBTBYT4(UCBPTR)                       1045 03138000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1046 03139000
*          (UCBPTR,                                                1046 03140000
*           DEBPTR) UNRSTD;                                        1046 03141000
*         R2=USSA;                  /* UNIT TYPE AND ADDR IN R2      */ 03142000
         L     R2,USSA(,IOMBPTR)                                   1047 03143000
*         R15=CVT0SCR1;             /* PTR TO IECSCR1 ROUTINE        */ 03144000
*                                                                  1048 03145000
         L     @09,CVTPTR                                          1048 03146000
         L     R15,CVT0SCR1(,@09)                                  1048 03147000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03148000
*         /*                                                         */ 03149000
*         /* REGISTERS 9, 10, AND 11 ARE DESTROYED BY SET SECTOR     */ 03150000
*         /* RECORD CONVERT ROUTINE                                  */ 03151000
*         /*                                                         */ 03152000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03153000
*                                                                  1049 03154000
*         RESPECIFY                                                1049 03155000
*          (RW2,                                                   1049 03156000
*           RW3,                                                   1049 03157000
*           RW4,                                                   1049 03158000
*           R11) RSTD;                                             1049 03159000
*         RW2=R11;                  /* SAVE BASE REGISTER            */ 03160000
         LR    RW2,R11                                             1050 03161000
*         GEN(BALR  14,15);         /* OBTAIN SECTOR VALUE           */ 03162000
         BALR  14,15                                                    03163000
*         R11=RW2;                  /* RESTORE BASE REGISTER         */ 03164000
         LR    R11,RW2                                             1052 03165000
*         R14=IOMSAVE7;             /* RESTORE REG 14                */ 03166000
         L     R14,IOMSAVE7(,IOMBPTR)                              1053 03167000
*       END;                        /* END TRK OFLO          @Z30SSLP*/ 03168000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      1055 03169000
*    (R2,                                                          1055 03170000
*     RW2,                                                         1055 03171000
*     RW3,                                                         1055 03172000
*     RW4) UNRSTD;                  /*                       @Z30SSLP*/ 03173000
*   END CONVERT;                    /*                       @Z30SSLP*/ 03174000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  1056 03175000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  1056 03176000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 1056 03177000
*                                                                  1057 03178000
*/*  THIS IS THE FRR ROUTINE TO BE ENTERED IN CASE OF FAILURE DURING */ 03179000
*/*   EXECUTION OF THE ABP MODULE.  IF THE MEMORY IS STILL VALID AND */ 03180000
*/*   PAGES WERE FIXED IN SIOD, THE PAGES ARE FREED.  RETURN IS MADE */ 03181000
*/*   TO RTM, WHERE THE LOCAL LOCK IS RELEASED.                      */ 03182000
*                                                                  1057 03183000
*IDA121F2:                                                         1057 03184000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               1057 03185000
*                                                                  1057 03186000
IDA121F2 DS    0H                                                  1058 03187000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03188000
*   /*                                                               */ 03189000
*   /* AN ID FIELD IS REQUIRED FOR RECORDING REQUESTED IN THE SETRP  */ 03190000
*   /* MACRO                                                         */ 03191000
*   /*                                                               */ 03192000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03193000
*                                                                  1058 03194000
*   DCL                                                            1058 03195000
*     IDFIELD CHAR(24) STATIC LOCAL INIT('IDA121A2IDA121A2IDA121F2');   03196000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      1059 03197000
*    (R0,                                                          1059 03198000
*     SDWAPTR,                                                     1059 03199000
*     R6,                                                          1059 03200000
*     RW1,                                                         1059 03201000
*     R13,                                                         1059 03202000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   1059 03203000
*   R13=R0;                         /* PTR TO 200-BYTE WORK AREA     */ 03204000
         LR    R13,R0                                              1060 03205000
*   RW1=SDWAPARM;                   /* PTR TO PARM FIELD FROM SDWA   */ 03206000
         L     RW1,SDWAPARM(,SDWAPTR)                              1061 03207000
*   R11=BASER11;                    /* RESTORE BASE REGISTER VALUE   */ 03208000
         L     R11,BASER11(,RW1)                                   1062 03209000
*   R12=BASER12;                    /* RESTORE BASE REGISTER VALUE   */ 03210000
         L     R12,BASER12(,RW1)                                   1063 03211000
*   SDWADDR=SDWAPTR;                /* PTR TO SDWA FROM REG 1        */ 03212000
         ST    SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RW1)                               1064 03213000
*   RETADDR=R14;                    /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 03214000
         ST    R14,RETADDR(,RW1)                                   1065 03215000
*   IOMBPTR=IOMBADR;                /* PTR TO IOMB FROM PARM FIELD   */ 03216000
         L     IOMBPTR,IOMBADR(,RW1)                               1066 03217000
*   R6=ADDR(MOVELIST)-ADDR(DUMPLIST)-ONE;/* LIST LENGTH IN R6        */ 03218000
*                                                                  1067 03219000
         LA    R6,MOVELIST                                         1067 03220000
         LA    @10,DUMPLIST                                        1067 03221000
         SLR   R6,@10                                              1067 03222000
         BCTR  R6,0                                                1067 03223000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03224000
*   /*                                                               */ 03225000
*   /* MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT. REG 13 IS POINTED TO A SAVE   */ 03226000
*   /* AREA AT THE START OF THE 200-BYTE WORK AREA AS REQUIRED FOR A */ 03227000
*   /* BRANCH ENTRY IN THE SDUMP MACRO. RCPA (R4) POINTS TO THE END  */ 03228000
*   /* OF THE SAVE AREA WHERE SDUMP LIST FORM IS MOVED TO BE         */ 03229000
*   /* EXECUTED. RBUFC (R5) CONTAINS THE ADDRESS SPACE ID. REGISTERS */ 03230000
*   /* 14 AND 15 ARE USED FOR BRANCH. REGISTER 1 IS ALSO USED.       */ 03231000
*   /*                                                               */ 03232000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03233000
*                                                                  1068 03234000
*   RCPA=R13+SEVENTY2;              /* POINTER TO AREA FOR SDUMP     */ 03235000
         LA    RCPA,72                                             1068 03236000
         ALR   RCPA,R13                                            1068 03237000
*   RBUFC=IOSASID;                  /* ADDR SPACE TO BE DUMPED IN R4 */ 03238000
         L     @10,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               1069 03239000
         LH    RBUFC,IOSASID(,@10)                                 1069 03240000
         N     RBUFC,@CF03366                                      1069 03241000
*   GEN REFS(MOVELIST,R6,CVTSDMP,CVTMAP);                          1070 03242000
           EX      R6,MOVELIST      MOVE SDUMP LIST TO WORK AREA        03243000
           SDUMP   BRANCH=YES,ASID=(5),MF=(E,(4))  EXECUTE SDUMP        03244000
*   SDWAPTR=SDWADDR;                /* RESET SDWA PTR IN REG @ZA00144*/ 03245000
         L     SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RW1)                               1071 03246000
*   IF SDWAFMIDÂ¬=ZERO THEN          /* MEMORY MAY NOT BE VALID       */ 03247000
         LH    @10,SDWAFMID(,SDWAPTR)                              1072 03248000
         N     @10,@CF03366                                        1072 03249000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             1072 03250000
         BNZ   @RT01072                                            1072 03251000
*     GO TO EXIT;                   /* SKIP PROCESSING               */ 03252000
*   IF IOMPGFIX=ON THEN             /* PAGES WERE FIXED BY SIOD      */ 03253000
         TM    IOMPGFIX(IOMBPTR),B'00000010'                       1074 03254000
         BNO   @RF01074                                            1074 03255000
*     DO;                                                          1075 03256000
*       R1=IOMVSL;                  /* POINTER TO VSL                */ 03257000
         L     R1,IOMVSL(,IOMBPTR)                                 1076 03258000
*       VSLFREE=ON;                 /* CHANGE VSL - PAGEFREE ENTRY   */ 03259000
*       VSLFIX=OFF;                                                1078 03260000
         OI    VSLFREE(R1),B'00100000'                             1078 03261000
         NI    VSLFIX(R1),B'10111111'                              1078 03262000
*       R0=ZERO;                    /* ZERO REGISTER 0               */ 03263000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               1079 03264000
*       R1=R1|PAGEMASK;             /* HIGH BIT ON IN REGISTER 1     */ 03265000
         O     R1,@CF00146                                         1080 03266000
*       RCPA=SRBPTCB;               /* POINTER TO TCB IN REGISTER 4  */ 03267000
         L     @10,IOMIOSB(,IOMBPTR)                               1081 03268000
         L     @10,IOSSRB(,@10)                                    1081 03269000
         L     RCPA,SRBPTCB(,@10)                                  1081 03270000
*       CALL CVTVPSIB;              /* BRANCH TO PAGEFREE    @Z40GSDT*/ 03271000
         L     @10,CVTPTR                                          1082 03272000
         L     @15,CVTVPSIB(,@10)                                  1082 03273000

*       IOMPGFIX=OFF;                                              1083 03275000

*       SDWAPTR=SDWADDR;            /* RESET SDWA PTR IN REG @ZA00144*/ 03277000
         L     SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RW1)                               1084 03278000

*EXIT:                                                             1086 03280000

*   /*                                                               */ 03283000
*   /* ISSUE SETRP MACRO TO RELEASE THE LOCAL LOCK                   */ 03284000
*   /*                                                               */ 03285000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03286000
*                                                                  1086 03287000

*     RESPECIFY                                                    1087 03292000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1087 03293000

@PB00004 DS    0H                                                  1097 03320000
*                                                                  1097 03321000
*/********************************************************************/ 03322000
*/*                                                                  */ 03323000
*/* IF AN ERROR OCCURS BEFORE THE APPENDAGES GET CONTROL, SUCH THAT  */ 03324000
*/* IOS POST STATUS ATTEMPTS TO SCHEDULE ITS CALLERS TERMINATION     */ 03325000

*                                                                  1097 03329000
*ABPTERM:                           /*                       @ZA01507*/ 03330000

*     R12,                                                         1097 03339000

*     R14,                                                         1098 03349000
*     R15) RSTD;                    /* REGS 1,3,5,8,9,14,15  @ZA14236*/ 03350000

*    (IOSB) BASED(RW3);             /*                       @ZA01507*/ 03352000
*   GEN(USING *,RW2);               /* REG 8 IS BASE REG     @ZA01507*/ 03353000

*   RW2=R15;                        /* ESTABLISH BASE REG    @ZA01507*/ 03355000

*   /*                                                               */ 03365000

*   /*                                                               */ 03367000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 03368000
*                                                                  1105 03369000
*   SPKA(IOMCKEY);                  /* SWITCH TO USER KEY    @Z40TSDT*/ 03370000

*   BUFCEPT=ON;                     /* SET COMPLETION BIT    @ZA01507*/ 03374000

*    (R0) RSTD;                     /* REG 0                 @ZA14236*/ 03381000
*   IF IOMPGADÂ¬=ZERO THEN           /* ASM OR SRB ICIP ?     @Z40TSDT*/ 03382000

*       /*                                                           */ 03389000
*       /* BRANCH TO SRB WITH ENTRY POINT IN REG 15, RETURN ADDR IN  */ 03390000

./  ADD  SSI=81790423,NAME=IDA121A3
         TITLE 'IDA121A3 - MVM I/O MANAGER NORMAL END APPENDAGE        *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA121A3 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA121A3  78.179'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @09,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@09                                         0001 00012000
RBPRFXLN EQU 64                                                         00013000
RBPRFLNA EQU 32                                                         00014000
PRBLEN   EQU 136                                                        00015000

*           IOSPGAD=ADDR(IDA121R3); /* ADDRESS OF RESUME RTN @Z40GSDT*/ 00410000

*         END;                      /* BR 0 WILL SYNC        @Z40GSDT*/ 00413000
*       IOMEEXIT=ON;                /* EXIT BIT FOR REC MGT  @ZA02276*/ 00414000

*/*                                                                  */ 00577000
*/*   RESUME ROUTINE FOR NORMAL END AND ABNORMAL END APPENDAGES.     */ 00578000

*IDA121F3:                                                         0349 00603000
*                                                                  0349 00604000

*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0349 00611000

*     IDFIELD CHAR(24) STATIC LOCAL INIT('IDA121A3IDA121A3IDA121F3');   00614000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0351 00615000

*   /*                                                               */ 00639000
*   /* NO PROCESSING IF MEMORY IN ERROR                              */ 00640000

*                                                                  0360 00643000
*   IF SDWAFMIDÂ¬=ZERO THEN                                         0360 00644000

         BCTR  RCPA,0                                              0362 00654000
*/****************************************************************   */ 00655000
*/*          MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT                          */ 00656000
*/****************************************************************   */ 00657000
*/*  REGISTER 1  - USED BY SDUMP.                                    */ 00658000
*/*  REGISTER 10 - POINTS TO END OF SAVE AREA WHERE SDUMP LIST FORM  */ 00659000
*/*                IS TO BE MOVED AND THEN EXECUTED.                 */ 00660000
*/*  REGISTER 13 - POINTS TO SAVE AREA AT START OF WORK AREA.        */ 00661000
*/*  REGISTERS 14 AND 15 - USED FOR BRANCH ENTRY.                    */ 00662000
*/****************************************************************   */ 00663000
*                                                                  0363 00664000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0363 00665000

*       GEN REFS(MOVELIST,RCPA,CVTSDMP,CVTMAP);                    0366 00674000
*                                                                  0366 00675000

*       /*************************************************************/ 00678000
*       /*                                                           */ 00679000
*       /* SDWA BASED ON REGISTER 1 IN SETRP CALL, USES R15          */ 00680000

*                                                                  0367 00683000

@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0378 00714000

*     END;                                                         0379 00717000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0380 00718000

*                                                                  0380 00723000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00725000
*   /*                                                               */ 00726000
*   /* ESTABLISH FRR                                                 */ 00727000

*                                                                  0381 00730000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0381 00731000

*                                                                  0389 00758000

*                                                                  0390 00762000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00764000
*   /*                                                               */ 00765000
*   /* CHECK BITS TO PROCEED WITH NORMAL END PROCESSING              */ 00766000
*   /*                                                               */ 00767000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00768000
*                                                                  0391 00769000
*   IF BIT1=OFF THEN                /* BUFC BITS NOT SET             */ 00770000

*     GO TO SETBITS;                /* NEED TO SET BUFC BITS         */ 00773000
*   ELSE                            /* BIT1 ON - BUFC BITS SET       */ 00774000

*       GO TO REPL;                 /* CHECK OF REPLICATED WRITE     */ 00778000

*             GO TO CALLER;         /* CHECK IF ASM OR RECORD MGR    */ 00789000

*             ;                     /* BIT5 ON                       */ 00791000
*         ELSE                                                     0400 00792000
*           ;                       /* BIT4 ON                       */ 00793000
@RF00396 DS    0H                                                  0401 00794000
*       ELSE                        /* BIT3 ON - CALLED BY ASM       */ 00795000
*         GO TO FRREXIT;            /* ISSUE SETRP AND GO TO RTM     */ 00796000
*                                                                  0401 00797000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00798000
*   /*                                                               */ 00799000
*   /* BIT3 OFF AND BIT4 OR BIT5 ON SO CALLED BY RECORD MANAGER      */ 00800000
*   /*                                                               */ 00801000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00802000
*                                                                  0402 00803000
*   IF PLHASYRQ=OFF THEN                                           0402 00804000
         L     @02,IOMPLH(,RIOMB)                                  0402 00805000

*   /* FORMAT IF CHANGED FOR UPDATE REPLICATED WRITE                 */ 00888000

*   IF IOMSRBM=OFF&                 /* SKIP IF SRB MODE OR   @Z40GSDT*/ 01197000

         TM    IOMSRBM(RIOMB),B'00000011'                          0519 01199000
         BNZ   @RF00519                                            0519 01200000
*     IOMSAVEE=IOMSAVEE+IGNORE;     /* IGNORE OFFSET ADDED TO RETURN */ 01201000
         LA    @08,4                                               0520 01202000
         AL    @08,IOMSAVEE(,RIOMB)                                0520 01203000
         ST    @08,IOMSAVEE(,RIOMB)                                0520 01204000
*   IOMSAVE5=ADDR(ABPBR14);         /* PTR TO BRANCH 14 INSTRUCTION  */ 01205000
*                                                                  0521 01206000
@RF00519 L     @08,CVTPTR                                          0521 01207000
         L     @08,CVTIOBP(,@08)                                   0521 01208000
         LA    @08,ABPBR14(,@08)                                   0521 01209000
         ST    @08,IOMSAVE5(,RIOMB)                                0521 01210000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01211000
*   /*                                                               */ 01212000
*   /* FREE FRR AND RESTORE REGISTERS BEFORE RETURN                  */ 01213000
*   /*                                                               */ 01214000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01215000
*                                                                  0522 01216000
*FRREXIT:                                                          0522 01217000
*   GEN SETS(RWORK1,RWORK2,FRRSCURR,FRRSELEN) REFS(PSACSTK,FRRS,FRRSEMP 01218000
*       )(SETFRR  D,WRKREGS=(RWORK1,RWORK2));                      0522 01219000
*                                                                  0522 01220000
FRREXIT  SETFRR  D,WRKREGS=(RWORK1,RWORK2)                              01221000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01222000
*   /*                                                               */ 01223000
*   /* ISSUE SETRP                                                   */ 01224000
*   /*                                                               */ 01225000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01226000
*                                                                  0523 01227000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0523 01228000
*    (RPARM) RSTD;                                                 0523 01229000
*   RPARM=IOMSAVE6;                 /* RESTORE PARAMETER LIST ADDR   */ 01230000
         L     RPARM,IOMSAVE6(,RIOMB)                              0524 01231000
*   SDWAPTR=SDWADDR;                /* RESTORE POINTER TO SDWA       */ 01232000
         L     SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RPARM)                             0525 01233000
*   STM(R0,R15,SDWASRSV);           /* COPY REGISTERS INTO SDWA      */ 01234000
         STM   R0,R15,SDWASRSV(SDWAPTR)                            0526 01235000
*   DO;                             /* SETRP RECORD(YES)RECPARM(IDFIE   01236000
*                                      LD)RETREGS(YES)RC(4)RETADDR(NE   01237000
*                                      RETRY)                        */ 01238000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0528 01239000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0528 01240000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0528 01241000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0528 01242000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              0528 01243000
*     GPR01P->SDWARCDE=4;           /* STORE RC INTO SDWA            */ 01244000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'04'                              0529 01245000
*     GPR01P->SDWARTYA=ADDR(NERETRY);/* SAVE RETRY ADDRESS           */ 01246000
         LA    @02,NERETRY                                         0530 01247000
         ST    @02,SDWARTYA(,GPR01P)                               0530 01248000
*     GPR01P->SDWARCRD='1'B;        /* TURN ON RECORD INDICATOR      */ 01249000
         OI    SDWARCRD(GPR01P),B'10000000'                        0531 01250000
*     GPR15P=ADDR(IDFIELD);         /* ACCESS RECORD PARAMETER LIST  */ 01251000
         LA    GPR15P,IDFIELD                                      0532 01252000
*     GPR01P->SDWARECP=GPR15P->I256C(1:24);/* COPY RECORD PARAMETERS */ 01253000
         MVC   SDWARECP(24,GPR01P),I256C(GPR15P)                   0533 01254000
*     GPR01P->SDWAUPRG='1'B;        /* TURN ON RETREGS INDICATOR     */ 01255000
         OI    SDWAUPRG(GPR01P),B'00001000'                        0534 01256000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0535 01257000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0535 01258000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0535 01259000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0535 01260000
*       GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                            0535 01261000
*   END;                                                           0536 01262000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0537 01263000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0537 01264000
*   R14=RETADDR;                    /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01265000
         L     R14,RETADDR(,RPARM)                                 0538 01266000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0539 01267000
*     R14 UNRSTD;                                                  0539 01268000
*   END IDA121F3;                                                  0540 01269000
         B     @EL00003                                            0540 01270000
*NERETRY:                                                          0541 01271000
*                                                                  0541 01272000
*/********************************************************************/ 01273000
*/*                                                                  */ 01274000
*/*    RETRY ROUTINE  - TO BE ENTERED IF FRR ROUTINE COMPLETES       */ 01275000
*/*                                                                  */ 01276000
*/********************************************************************/ 01277000
*                                                                  0541 01278000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0541 01279000
*                                                                  0541 01280000
NERETRY  DS    0H                                                  0542 01281000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01282000
*   /*                                                               */ 01283000
*   /* UPDATED REGISTERS ARE RESTORED AS INDICATED IN FRR            */ 01284000
*   /*                                                               */ 01285000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01286000
*                                                                  0542 01287000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0542 01288000
*    (RWORK3,                                                      0542 01289000
*     R14,                                                         0542 01290000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   0542 01291000
*   RWORK3=IOMSAVEC;                /* RESTORE PTR TO SAVE AREA      */ 01292000
         L     RWORK3,IOMSAVEC(,RIOMB)                             0543 01293000
*   R14=IOMSAVEE;                   /* RETURN ADDR OF CALLER         */ 01294000
         L     R14,IOMSAVEE(,RIOMB)                                0544 01295000
*   R15=IOMSAVE5;                   /* RESTORE CONTENTS OF R15       */ 01296000
         L     R15,IOMSAVE5(,RIOMB)                                0545 01297000
*   IOMLOCK=OFF;                                                   0546 01298000
         MVI   IOMLOCK(RIOMB),B'00000000'                          0546 01299000
*   GEN SETS(R2,RIOMB,RBUFC,RCPA) REFS(IOMSAVE0)                   0547 01300000
*       (LM    2,5,IOMSAVE0(RIOMB));/* RESTORE REGS 2 THROUGH 5      */ 01301000
         LM    2,5,IOMSAVE0(RIOMB)                                      01302000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0548 01303000
*    (RWORK3,                                                      0548 01304000
*     R14,                                                         0548 01305000
*     R15) UNRSTD;                                                 0548 01306000
*   END NERETRY;                                                   0549 01307000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0549 01308000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0549 01309000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0549 01310000
*F3FRR:                                                            0550 01311000
*                                                                  0550 01312000
*/********************************************************************/ 01313000
*/*                                                                  */ 01314000
*/*          FRR ROUTINE FOR NORMAL END FRR ROUTINE                  */ 01315000
*/*                                                                  */ 01316000
*/********************************************************************/ 01317000
*                                                                  0550 01318000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0550 01319000
F3FRR    DS    0H                                                  0551 01320000
*   DCL                                                            0551 01321000
*     IDFIELD1 CHAR(24) STATIC LOCAL INIT('IDA121A3IDA121A3F3FRR   ');  01322000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0552 01323000
*    (R0,                                                          0552 01324000
*     SDWAPTR,                                                     0552 01325000
*     RWORK3,                                                      0552 01326000
*     R14,                                                         0552 01327000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   0552 01328000
*   RPARM=SDWAPARM;                 /* ADDR OF PARM FIELD FROM SDWA  */ 01329000
         L     RPARM,SDWAPARM(,SDWAPTR)                            0553 01330000
*   SDWADDR=SDWAPTR;                /* SDWA PTR IN PARMLIST FROM R1  */ 01331000
         ST    SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RPARM)                             0554 01332000
*   RWORK3=R0;                      /* SAVE AREA AT 200 BYTE AREA    */ 01333000
         LR    RWORK3,R0                                           0555 01334000
*   RETADDR=R14;                    /* SAVE RETURN ADDR IN PARMLIST  */ 01335000
         ST    R14,RETADDR(,RPARM)                                 0556 01336000
*   RIOMB=IOMBADR;                  /* PTR TO IOMB FROM PARM FIELD   */ 01337000
         L     RIOMB,IOMBADR(,RPARM)                               0557 01338000
*   RBASE=BASEREG;                  /* RESTORE BASE REG CONTENTS     */ 01339000
         L     RBASE,BASEREG(,RPARM)                               0558 01340000
*   IOSBPTR=IOMIOSB;                /* PTR TO IOSB                   */ 01341000
         L     IOSBPTR,IOMIOSB(,RIOMB)                             0559 01342000
*   RCPA=ADDR(MOVELIST)-ADDR(DUMPLIST)-ONE;/* LIST LENGTH IN REG 5   */ 01343000
         LA    RCPA,MOVELIST                                       0560 01344000
         LA    @02,DUMPLIST                                        0560 01345000
         SLR   RCPA,@02                                            0560 01346000
         BCTR  RCPA,0                                              0560 01347000
*/****************************************************************   */ 01348000
*/*          MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT                          */ 01349000
*/****************************************************************   */ 01350000
*/*  REGISTER 1  - USED BY SDUMP.                                    */ 01351000
*/*  REGISTER 10 - POINTS TO END OF SAVE AREA WHERE SDUMP LIST FORM  */ 01352000
*/*                IS TO BE MOVED AND THEN EXECUTED.                 */ 01353000
*/*  REGISTER 13 - POINTS TO SAVE AREA AT START OF WORK AREA.        */ 01354000
*/*  REGISTERS 14 AND 15 - USED FOR BRANCH ENTRY.                    */ 01355000
*/****************************************************************   */ 01356000
*                                                                  0561 01357000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0561 01358000
*    (R10,                                                         0561 01359000
*     R11) RSTD;                                                   0561 01360000
*   R10=RWORK3+SEVENTY2;                                           0562 01361000
         LA    R10,72                                              0562 01362000
         ALR   R10,RWORK3                                          0562 01363000
*   R11=IOSASID;                    /* ADDR SPACE TO BE DUMPED       */ 01364000
         LH    R11,IOSASID(,IOSBPTR)                               0563 01365000
         N     R11,@CF02961                                        0563 01366000
*   GEN REFS(MOVELIST,RCPA,CVTSDMP,CVTMAP);                        0564 01367000
         EX      RCPA,MOVELIST    MOVE SDUMP LIST TO WORK AREA          01368000
         SDUMP   BRANCH=YES,ASID=(11),MF=(E,(10))  EXECUTE SDUMP        01369000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0565 01370000
*    (R10,                                                         0565 01371000
*     R11) UNRSTD;                                                 0565 01372000
*   SDWAPTR=SDWADDR;                /* RESTORE SDWA BASE REG @ZA00144*/ 01373000
         L     SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RPARM)                             0566 01374000
*   IF SDWAFMIDÂ¬=ZERO THEN          /* MEMORY NOT DEPENDABLE         */ 01375000
         LH    @02,SDWAFMID(,SDWAPTR)                              0567 01376000
         N     @02,@CF02961                                        0567 01377000
         LTR   @02,@02                                             0567 01378000
         BNZ   @RT00567                                            0567 01379000
*     GO TO ERREXIT;                /* SKIP ALL PROCESSING           */ 01380000
*                                                                  0568 01381000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01382000
*   /*                                                               */ 01383000
*   /* FREE PAGES FIXED IN SIOD                                      */ 01384000
*   /*                                                               */ 01385000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01386000
*                                                                  0569 01387000
*   IF IOMPGFIX=ON THEN             /* RELEASE PAGES FIXED BY SIOD   */ 01388000
         TM    IOMPGFIX(RIOMB),B'00000010'                         0569 01389000
         BNO   @RF00569                                            0569 01390000
*     DO;                                                          0570 01391000
*       R1=IOMVSL;                  /* POINTER TO VSL                */ 01392000
         L     R1,IOMVSL(,RIOMB)                                   0571 01393000
*       VSLFREE=ON;                 /* CHANGE VSL - PAGEFREE ENTRY   */ 01394000
*       VSLFIX=OFF;                                                0573 01395000
         OI    VSLFREE(R1),B'00100000'                             0573 01396000
         NI    VSLFIX(R1),B'10111111'                              0573 01397000
*       R0=ZERO;                    /* ZERO REGISTER 0               */ 01398000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               0574 01399000
*       R1=R1|PAGEMASK;             /* HIGH BIT ON IN REGISTER 1     */ 01400000
         O     R1,@CF00107                                         0575 01401000
*       RBUFC=ZERO;                 /* NO ACCNTING           @Z30SSLP*/ 01402000
         SLR   RBUFC,RBUFC                                         0576 01403000
*       CALL CVTVPSIB;              /* BRANCH TO PAGEFREE ROUTINE    */ 01404000
         L     @02,CVTPTR                                          0577 01405000
         L     @15,CVTVPSIB(,@02)                                  0577 01406000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0577 01407000
*       IOMPGFIX=OFF;                                              0578 01408000
         NI    IOMPGFIX(RIOMB),B'11111101'                         0578 01409000
*       SDWAPTR=SDWADDR;            /* RESTORE SDWA BASE REG @ZA00144*/ 01410000
         L     SDWAPTR,SDWADDR(,RPARM)                             0579 01411000
*     END;                                                         0580 01412000
*ERREXIT:                                                          0581 01413000
*                                                                  0581 01414000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01415000
*   /*                                                               */ 01416000
*   /* SDWA BASED ON REGISTER 1 IN SETRP CALL, USES R15              */ 01417000
*   /*                                                               */ 01418000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01419000
*                                                                  0581 01420000
*   DO;                             /* SETRP RECORD(YES)RECPARM(IDFIE   01421000
*                                      LD1)RC(0)FRELOCK(LOCAL)       */ 01422000
@RF00569 DS    0H                                                  0581 01423000
ERREXIT  DS    0H                                                  0582 01424000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0582 01425000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0582 01426000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0582 01427000

         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'00'                              0583 01431000

         LA    GPR15P,IDFIELD1                                     0585 01435000
*     GPR01P->SDWARECP=GPR15P->I256C(1:24);/* COPY RECORD PARAMETERS */ 01436000
         MVC   SDWARECP(24,GPR01P),I256C(GPR15P)                   0586 01437000
*     GPR01P->SDWAACF4=GPR01P->SDWAACF4|'00000001'B;/* INITIALIZE  0587 01438000
*                                      LOCK FLAGS                    */ 01439000
         OI    SDWAACF4(GPR01P),B'00000001'                        0587 01440000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0588 01441000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0588 01442000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0588 01443000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0588 01444000

*   R14=RETADDR;                    /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01447000

@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0591 01450000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0591 01451000

*IDA121F4:                                                         0555 01316000
*                                                                  0555 01317000

*   /*                                                               */ 01319000

*   /*                                                               */ 01357000
*   /* MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT REGISTER 13 POINTS TO A SAVE   */ 01358000

@RF00543 EQU   @RC00540                                                 04648000

@ENDDATA EQU   *                                                        04651000
         END   IDA121A4,(C'PLS0038',0701,78180)                         04652000
./  ADD  SSI=81720310,NAME=IDA121A5
         TITLE 'IDA121A5--MVM I/O MANAGER ASYNCHRONOUS ROUTINE         *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IDA121A5 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IDA121A5  78.172'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @08,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@08                                         0001 00012000
*   RIOMB=R1;                       /* SAVE POINTER TO IOMB          */ 00013000
         LR    RIOMB,R1                                            0120 00014000
*   IOSBPTR=IOMIOSB;                /* ADDRESSING FOR IOSB           */ 00015000
         L     IOSBPTR,IOMIOSB(,RIOMB)                             0121 00016000
*/********************************************************************/ 00017000
*/*        IF NOT AN ASYNCH REQUEST, FIND PLH WITH EOV WAIT ON.      */ 00018000
*/*        IF EOV WAITING, SET DEFERRED REQUEST PENDING BIT. @Z30SSMR*/ 00019000
*/********************************************************************/ 00020000
*                                                                  0122 00021000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0122 00022000
*    (RRPL,                                                        0122 00023000
*     RPLH,                                                        0122 00024000
*     RAMB,                                                        0122 00025000
*     RBUFC,                                                       0122 00026000
*     R7) RSTD;                     /*                       @ZA00960*/ 00027000
*   RPLH=IOMPLH;                    /* PLH ADDRESS                   */ 00028000
         L     RPLH,IOMPLH(,RIOMB)                                 0123 00029000
*   RAMB=IOMAMB;                    /* AMB ADDRESS                   */ 00030000
         L     RAMB,IOMAMB(,RIOMB)                                 0124 00031000
*   RBUFC=IOMBUFC;                  /* BUFC ADDRESS IN REGISTER 4    */ 00032000
         L     RBUFC,IOMBUFC(,RIOMB)                               0125 00033000
*   ECBCOD=IOSCOD;                  /* POST ECB              @ZA00960*/ 00034000
         L     @15,IOMECBPT(,RIOMB)                                0126 00035000
         MVC   ECBCOD(1,@15),IOSCOD(IOSBPTR)                       0126 00036000
*   IF IOMXEOVW=ON THEN             /* EOV WAIT BIT ON       @ZA02269*/ 00037000
         L     @15,IOMUFLD(,RIOMB)                                 0127 00038000
         TM    IOMXEOVW(@15),B'01000000'                           0127 00039000
         BNO   @RF00127                                            0127 00040000
*     DO;                           /*                       @ZA00960*/ 00041000
*       IOMXEOVW=OFF;               /* IOMBX EOV WAIT OFF    @ZA02269*/ 00042000
         NI    IOMXEOVW(@15),B'10111111'                           0129 00043000
*       R7=AMBPH+LENGTH(IDAPLHDR);  /* FIRST PLH ENTRY       @ZA00960*/ 00044000
         LA    R7,16                                               0130 00045000
         AL    R7,AMBPH(,RAMB)                                     0130 00046000
*       DO UNTIL R7=ZERO;           /* CHECK ALL FOR EOV     @Z30SSMR*/ 00047000
@DL00131 DS    0H                                                  0132 00048000
*         IF R7->PLHEOVW=ON THEN    /* PLH FOUND.            @ZA00960*/ 00049000
         TM    PLHEOVW(R7),B'10000000'                             0132 00050000
         BNO   @RF00132                                            0132 00051000
*           DO;                     /* SEE WHETHER IT IS     @Z30SSMR*/ 00052000
*             R7->PLHDRPND=ON;      /* READY FOR RETRY       @Z30SSMR*/ 00053000
         OI    PLHDRPND(R7),B'00000010'                            0134 00054000
*           END;                    /* END PLH FOUND WAITING @Z30SSMR*/ 00055000
*         R7=R7->PLHCHAIN;          /* CHECK NEXT PLH        @Z30SSMR*/ 00056000
@RF00132 L     R7,PLHCHAIN(,R7)                                    0136 00057000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA00960*/ 00058000
@DE00131 LTR   R7,R7                                               0137 00059000
         BNZ   @DL00131                                            0137 00060000
*       IF PLHASYRQ=OFF THEN        /* IF CURR REQ IS SYN,   @Z30SSMR*/ 00061000
         TM    PLHASYRQ(RPLH),B'00000100'                          0138 00062000
         BZ    @RT00138                                            0138 00063000
*         RETURN;                   /* RETURN TO CALLER      @Z30SSMR*/ 00064000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA00960*/ 00065000
*/********************************************************************/ 00066000
*/*     SET UP REGISTERS FOR BRANCH TO ADDRESS IN PLHARET            */ 00067000
*/********************************************************************/ 00068000
*                                                                  0141 00069000
*EXIT:                                                             0141 00070000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0141 00071000
*    (RSAVE,                                                       0141 00072000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   0141 00073000
@RF00127 DS    0H                                                  0141 00074000
EXIT     DS    0H                                                  0142 00075000
*   RRPL=PLHCRPL;                   /* RPL ADDR IN REG 1     @ZA02269*/ 00076000
         L     RRPL,PLHCRPL(,RPLH)                                 0142 00077000
*   RSAVE=ADDR(IOMXR14)-RGSVHDR;    /* SET SAVE AREA IN IOMBX@ZA14809*/ 00078000
         L     @09,IOMUFLD(,RIOMB)                                 0143 00079000
         LA    RSAVE,IOMXR14(,@09)                                 0143 00080000
         SL    RSAVE,@CF00066                                      0143 00081000
*   IOMXR14=R14;                    /* SAVE R14 IN IOMBX     @ZA14809*/ 00082000
         ST    R14,IOMXR14(,@09)                                   0144 00083000
*   R15=PLHARET;                    /* ASYNCH ROUTINE RETURN ADDRESS */ 00084000
         L     R15,PLHARET(,RPLH)                                  0145 00085000
*   GEN(BR    15);                  /* BRANCH TO ADDRESS IN PLHARET  */ 00086000
         BR    15                                                       00087000
*/********************************************************************/ 00088000
*/*         MAINTENANCE SPACE                                        */ 00089000
*/********************************************************************/ 00090000
*                                                                  0147 00091000
*   GEN(DC    50X'00');                                            0147 00092000
         DC    50X'00'                                                  00093000
*   END IDA121A5                                                   0148 00094000
*                                                                  0148 00095000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 00096000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IDAAMB  )                                       */ 00097000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IDAAMBXN)                                       */ 00098000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IDAIOMB )                                       */ 00099000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IECDIOSB)                                       */ 00100000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IDAPLH  )                                       */ 00101000
*                                                                  0148 00102000
*       ;                                                          0148 00103000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0148 00104000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0148 00105000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0148 00106000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00107000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00108000
         DS    0F                                                       00109000
IDA121A5 CSECT                                                          00110000
         DS    0F                                                       00111000
@CF00066 DC    F'12'                                                    00112000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00113000
         DS    0D                                                       00114000
         ORG   *+1-(*-@DATD)/(*-@DATD) INSURE DSECT DATA                00115000
@ENDDATD EQU   *                                                        00116000
IDA121A5 CSECT                                                          00117000
         DS    0F                                                       00118000
@SIZDATD DC    AL1(0)                                                   00119000
         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      00120000
         DS    0D                                                       00121000
@00      EQU   00                      EQUATES FOR REGISTERS 0-15       00122000

*/********************************************************************/ 00294000
*/*                  QUIESCE REQUEST                                 */ 00295000
*/********************************************************************/ 00296000
*/*     INCREMENT IQE COUNT IN IPIB FOR EACH RELEVANT I/O MGR IQE    */ 00297000

*         GEN;                                                     0206 00356000

./  ADD  SSI=81720312,NAME=IDA121CV
IDA121CV CSECT                                                          00050002
      TITLE 'IDA121CV-IEZABP CSECT'                                     00100002
*                                                                       00150002
*     START OF SPECIFICATIONS *****                                     00200002
*                                                                       00250002
*01*  MODULE-NAME = IDA121CV                                            00300002
*                                                                       00350002
*01*  DESCRIPTIVE-NAME = IEZABP CSECT                                   00400002
*                                                                       00450002
*01*  COPYRIGHT = NONE                                                  00500002
*                                                                       00550002
*01*  STATUS = NONE                                                     00600002
*                                                                       00650002
*01*  CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                            00700002
*                                                                       00750002
*02*    A = NONE                                                        00800002
*02*    D = NONE                                                        00850002
*02*    C = NONE                                                        00900002
*                                                                       00950002
*01*  FUNCTION = THIS IS A CSECT FOR IEZABP AND CONTAINS THE ADDRESS    01000002
*     VECTORS FOR THE I/O MANAGEMENT ROUTINES WHICH RESIDE IN           01050002
*     THE NUCLEUS AND WHOSE ADDRESS IS REQUIRED BY OTHER ROUTINES.      01100002
*                                                                       01150002
*01*  NOTES = NONE                                                      01200002
*                                                                       01250002
*01*  MODULE-TYPE = REGULAR                                             01300002
*                                                                       01350002
*02*    PROCESSOR = PLS2                                                01400002
*                                                                       01450002
*02*    MODULE-SIZE = 20                                                01500002
*                                                                       01550002
*02*    ATTRIBUTES = NO EXECUTABLE CODE                                 01600002
*                                                                       01650002
*01*  ENTRY = IDA121CV                                                  01700002
*                                                                       01750002
*02*    PURPOSE = DEFINED ABOVE                                         01800002
*                                                                       01850002
*02*    LINKAGE = POINTER IN CVTIOBP                                    01900002
*                                                                       01950002
*02*    INPUT = NONE                                                    02000002
*                                                                       02050002
*02*    OUTPUT = ADDRESSES OF SUPERVISOR STATE I/O DRIVER,              02100002
*               ACTUAL BLOCK PROCESSOR, NORMAL END APPENDAGE,           02110002
*               AND ABNORMAL END APPENDAGE ARE PUT INTO                 02150002
*               IEZABP MACRO TOGETHER WITH A BR 14 INSTRUCTION.         02200002
*                                                                       02250002
*02*    EXIT-NORMAL = NO EXECUTABLE CODE                                02300002
*                                                                       02350002
*02*    EXIT-ERROR = NONE                                               02400002
*                                                                       02450002
*01*  EXTERNAL-REFERENCES = IGC121   (SIOD)                             02500002
*                           IDA121A2 (ABP)                              02550002
*                           IDA121A3 (NE)                               02560002
*                           IDA121A4 (AE)                               02600002
*                                                                       02650002
*01*  TABLES = NONE                                                     02700002
*                                                                       02750002
*01*  MACROS = NONE                                                     02800002
*                                                                       02850002
***** END OF SPECIFICATIONS *****/                                      02900002
*/********************************************************************/ 02950002
*/*                                                                  */ 03000002
*/*                      DECLARATIONS                                */ 03050002
*/*                                                                  */ 03100002
*/********************************************************************/ 03150002
*/*                                                                  */ 03200002
ABPID    DC    CL1'A'                                                   03250002
ABPLEN   DC    AL1(20)                                                  03300002
ABPBR14  DC    X'07FE'                                                  03350002
ABPSIOD  DC    VL4(IGC121)                                              03400002
ABPABP   DC    VL4(IDA121A2)                                            03450002
ABPNE    DC    VL4(IDA121A3)                                            03500002
ABPAE    DC    VL4(IDA121A4)                                            03550002
         END   IDA121CV                                                 03600002
./  ADD  SSI=81790416,NAME=IGC121
         TITLE 'IGC121-SUPERVISOR STATE I/O DRIVER                     *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00003000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00004000
JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00005000
RBPRFXLN EQU 64                                                         00006000
RBPRFLNA EQU 32                                                         00007000
PRBLEN   EQU 136                                                        00008000
SIRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00009000
TIRBLEN  EQU 136                                                        00010000
IRBLEN   EQU 128                                                        00011000
SVRBLEN  EQU 224                                                        00012000
IGC121   CSECT                                                          00013000
          BALR  @11,0                    ESTABLISH BASE REGISTER VALUE  00014000
          USING *,@11                    BASE REGISTER IS R11           00015000
          B     STARTCOD                 BYPASS DC AND EQU STATEMENTS   00016000
          DC    AL1(18)                  LENGTH OF ID          @Z40TSDT 00017000
          DC    C' IGC121 '              MODULE IDENTIFIER     @Z40TSDT 00018000
          DC    C' &SYSDATE '            DATE OF COMPILATION   @Z40TSDT 00019000
*STARTCOD:                                                         0205 00020000

*   RBUFC=R15;                      /* BUFC ADDRESS IN RBUFC REG     */ 00023000

*/********************************************************************/ 00373000
*/* CHAIN CHANNEL PROGRAM AREA BLOCKS.  IF CALLER IS NOT PRIVILEGED, */ 00374000
*/*   VALIDITY OF CPA'S MUST FIRST BE CHECKED.                       */ 00375000
*/********************************************************************/ 00376000
*                                                                  0309 00377000

*    (RW1,                                                         0309 00379000

*                                                                  0309 00382000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00384000
*   /*                                                               */ 00385000
*   /* RW1 POINTS TO THE CPA BEING CHECKED FROM BUFCCPA. RW2 POINTS  */ 00386000
*   /* TO THE CPA-S IN THE CHAIN FROM THE AMB. R15 POINTS TO THE LAST*/ 00387000
*   /* VALIDATED CPA FOR CHAINING TO THE NEXT                        */ 00388000
*   /*                                                               */ 00389000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00390000
*                                                                  0310 00391000
*   IF AMBLSR=ON|AMBGSR=ON THEN     /* IF SHR RES            @Z30SSLC*/ 00392000

*               BUFCEPT=ON;         /* COMPLETE BIT ON               */ 00770000

*               BUFCMW=OFF;         /* WRITE INDICATOR OFF           */ 00772000
*               BUFCRRD=OFF;        /* READ INDICATOR OFF            */ 00773000
         NI    BUFCMW(RBUFC),B'01011111'                           0450 00774000
*               GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);/* SW KEY           @ZA26357*/ 00775000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            00776000
*             END;                                                 0452 00777000
*         ELSE                      /* RBA VALID                     */ 00778000
*           DO;                     /*                       @ZA33015*/ 00779000
         B     @RC00434                                            0453 00780000
@RF00434 DS    0H                                                  0454 00781000
*             WRITEXT=CONM;         /* STORE EXTENT VALUE FOR WRITE  */ 00782000
*                                                                  0454 00783000
         IC    @14,CONM(,RCPA)                                     0454 00784000

*             /*******************************************************/ 00786000
*             /*                                                     */ 00787000
*             /* IF THIS IS A REPLICATED UPDATE WRITE REQUEST, THE   */ 00788000
*             /* PF-CPA MUST BE VALIDITY CHECKED FOR NON-PRIVILEGED  */ 00789000
*             /* USERS, AND IOMCPA POINTED TO THE PREFORMATTED CPA   */ 00790000

*                     RW2=AMBCPA;   /* FIRST CPA IN CPA CHAIN        */ 00817000

*                     DO WHILE RW2Â¬=ZERO;/* CHECK VALIDITY OF PF-CPA */ 00819000

@DL00464 DS    0H                                                  0465 00821000

*                         GO TO RESETPTR;/* SET POINTERS IF REPL   0466 00825000

*                                      CHAIN                         */ 00829000

*                     END;                                         0468 00831000

         BNZ   @DL00464                                            0468 00833000
*                     GO TO CPAERR; /* PF-CPA IS NOT VALID           */ 00834000
         B     CPAERR                                              0469 00835000
*                   END;                                           0470 00836000

*                 CPACPCHN=RCPA;    /* CHAIN PF-CPA TO ITSELF        */ 00838000

*                 RBUFC=IOMBUFC;    /* RESET BUFC POINTER TO 1ST BUFC*/ 00844000

*                 RESPECIFY                                        0474 00846000

*       END WRITE;                                                 0477 00852000

         AL    @15,AMDCINV(,@01)                                   0561 01160000
         ST    @15,VSLEND(,R14)                                    0561 01161000
*             VSLFLAG1=ZERO;        /* CLEAR FLAG1           @ZA25729*/ 01162000
         MVI   VSLFLAG1(R14),X'00'                                 0562 01163000
*             VSLFLAG2=ZERO;        /* CLEAR FLAG2           @ZA25729*/ 01164000
         MVI   VSLFLAG2(R14),X'00'                                 0563 01165000
*             R14=R14+EIGHT;        /* POINT TO NEXT VSL ENTRY       */ 01166000
         AL    R14,@CF00058                                        0564 01167000
*           END;                    /*                       @Z30SSLP*/ 01168000
*         IF AMBGSR=OFF&            /* NOT GSR & -           @Z30SSLP*/ 01169000
*             AMBPAMBL->AMBLFIX=OFF&/* NOT FIXED             @Z30SSLC*/ 01170000
*             IOMPLH->PLHVAMB=ON THEN/* REL 2 CB             @Z30SSLC*/ 01171000
@RF00558 L     @15,IOMAMB(,RIOMB)                                  0566 01172000

         AL    R14,@CF00058                                        0572 01193000

*       END;                                                       0574 01195000
@RF00566 DS    0H                                                  0575 01196000
*     RBUFC=BUFCNXT1;               /* POINTER TO NEXT BUFC          */ 01197000
@RF00517 L     RBUFC,BUFCNXT1(,RBUFC)                              0575 01198000
*     RCPA=CPACPCHN;                /* POINTER TO NEXT CPA           */ 01199000
         L     RCPA,CPACPCHN(,RCPA)                                0576 01200000
*   END;                                                           0577 01201000
*                                                                  0577 01202000
         BCTR  R0,0                                                0577 01203000
@DE00516 LTR   R0,R0                                               0577 01204000
         BP    @DL00516                                            0577 01205000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01206000
*   /*                                                               */ 01207000
*   /* COMPLETE VSL FOR PAGEFIX ENTRY                                */ 01208000
*   /*                                                               */ 01209000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01210000
*                                                                  0578 01211000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0578 01212000
*    (R15) RSTD;                                                   0578 01213000
*   IF IOMNSEG=ZERO THEN            /* NO VSL ENTRIES        @Z30SSLP*/ 01214000

*   VSLHIGH=ON;                     /* INDICATES LAST VSL ENTRY      */ 01234000
         OI    VSLHIGH(R14),B'10000000'                            0588 01235000
*   R14=IOMVSL;                     /* FIRST VSL ENTRY               */ 01236000

         OI    VSLFIX(R14),B'01000000'                             0590 01239000
*/********************************************************************/ 01240000
*/*           PREPARE REGISTERS FOR ENTRY TO PAGEFIX ROUTINE         */ 01241000
*/********************************************************************/ 01242000
*                                                                  0591 01243000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0591 01244000
*     R1 RESTRICTED;                /*                       @Z40GSDT*/ 01245000
*   R1=IOMVSL;                      /* POINTER TO VSL                */ 01246000
         LR    R1,@10                                              0592 01247000
*   IOMSAVE4=0;                     /* ZERO ECB              @Z30SSLC*/ 01248000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0593 01249000
         ST    @10,IOMSAVE4(,RIOMB)                                0593 01250000
*   R0=ADDR(IOMSAVE4);              /* PTR TO DUMMY ECB IN REG 0     */ 01251000
         LA    R0,IOMSAVE4(,RIOMB)                                 0594 01252000

         L     @10,CVTPTR                                          0598 01260000

         BALR  @14,@15                                             0598 01262000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0599 01263000

         L     RCPA,IOMCPA(,RIOMB)                                 0600 01266000
*/********************************************************************/ 01267000
*/*      CHECK PAGEFIX RETURN CODE                                   */ 01268000
*/********************************************************************/ 01269000
*                                                                  0601 01270000
*   IF R15=ZERO|                    /* ALL PAGES ARE FIXED   @Z40GSDT*/ 01271000
*       R15=EIGHT THEN              /* NOT ALL PAGES ARE IN CORE     */ 01272000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0601 01273000
         BZ    @RT00601                                            0601 01274000
         C     R15,@CF00058                                        0601 01275000
         BNE   @RF00601                                            0601 01276000
@RT00601 DS    0H                                                  0602 01277000
*/********************************************************************/ 01278000
*/*        REFERENCE EACH VPL ENTRY TO BRING PAGES INTO CORE         */ 01279000
*/*              FOR PAGE FIXING AND FOR VALIDITY CHECK              */ 01280000
*/********************************************************************/ 01281000
*                                                                  0602 01282000
*     DO;                                                          0602 01283000
*PAGEIN1:                                                          0603 01284000

*       /* SET MODE TO USER'S KEY WHILE REFERENCING PAGES            */ 01291000
*       /*                                                           */ 01292000

*         R14=CPAVPL;               /* POINTER TO VPL                */ 01304000

@RF00610 AL    R14,@CF00069                                        0612 01324000

@DE00608 LTR   R1,R1                                               0613 01327000

@DE00605 LTR   R0,R0                                               0616 01335000

*       GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO);   /* RESET KEY TO ZERO     @Z40GSDT*/ 01337000

*   /*                                                               */ 01342000

*   /*                                                               */ 01344000

*/*      BRANCH TO SMF ROUTINE TO COUNT EXCP'S                       */ 01438000

*                                                                  0652 01440000

*   /*                                                               */ 01447000

*       /*************************************************************/ 01531000
*       /*                                                           */ 01532000
*       /* NO VALID REQUEST FOUND SO RETURN TO CALLER                */ 01533000
*       /*                                                           */ 01534000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01535000
*                                                                  0673 01536000
*       IOMLOCK=OFF;                                               0673 01537000

         B     EXIT                                                0674 01540000
*STOREUCB:                          /* UCB BASED ON DEB EXTENT       */ 01541000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0675 01542000
*        (R6) RSTD;                                                0675 01543000

*IDA121F1:                                                         0752 01804000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0752 01805000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 01839000
*   /*                                                               */ 01840000
*   /* MOVE SDUMP LIST AND EXECUTE IT. REG 13 IS POINTED TO A SAVE   */ 01841000
*   /* AREA AT THE START OF THE 200-BYTER WORK AREA AS REQUIRED FOR A*/ 01842000
*   /* BRANCH ENTRY IN THE SDUMP MACRO. RCPA (R4) POINTS TO THE END  */ 01843000

*   /* EXECUTED. RBUFC (R5) CONTAINS THE ADDRESS SPACE ID. REGISTERS */ 01845000

*FREXIT:                                                           0782 01903000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 01905000
*   /*                                                               */ 01906000
*   /* ISSUE SETRP MACRO TO RELEASE THE LOCAL LOCK                   */ 01907000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 01909000
*                                                                  0782 01910000

*     RESPECIFY                                                    0783 01915000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0783 01916000
